About the job
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,‚ÄØenhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Our Purpose - Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (WITH RELOCATION PROVIDED)

Location: Bangkok, Thailand (*Not open for remote work)

Get to Know our Team:

As part of the Supply Analytics, you will be responsible for identifying new partners and opportunities, cultivating a relationship with them, and working together with them to deliver the best outcome for our end customers. You would also be responsible with managing the day-to-day interaction with the partner and working closely with other teams within Agoda to ensure the partners needs are met.

We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda‚Äôs unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.

The Opportunity: 

As a Business Analyst, you will report directly to either the Senior Manager or Associate Director within the Supply Department and this will be an individual contributor role. You will be responsible and fully empowered to work with the partners on the ground. You will be supported by a team within the Supply department and work closely with other Team members within Agoda.

In this Role, you‚Äôll get to:

Translate internal briefs into analytical projects (to include refining the initial brief and asking the ‚Äòright questions‚Äô, working through potential hypotheses and storyboarding the output)
Use and analyze data from multiple large-scale data warehouses and present statistically strong analysis to a wide range of business stakeholders.
Proactively identify opportunities for growth within supply and the wider business.
Drive new analytical initiatives and projects aimed at improving organizational efficiency and shaping Agoda supply.
Identify, support, and lead projects aimed at scaling up the way the Supply organization leverages on data, insights, and intelligence.
Automate manual operational processes and present back on time savings gained through modernization of business operations

What you‚Äôll Need to Succeed:

At least 2-5+ years of experience working as an Analyst with experience in analytics/data science/insights/strategy/BI
Advanced working knowledge and hands-on experience in SQL
Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in data visualization tools such as Tableau (preferably) 
Expert domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, Python (or R)
Bachelor‚Äôs degree ideally in a business or quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
A good understanding of statistical modelling knowledge or any machine learning technique knowledge (such as hypothesis testing, regression, logistic regression, random forest, etc.)
Good stakeholder management experience. Comfortable presenting to senior leadership and C-suite.
Experience in conducting A/B testing experimentation
Strong experience in finding data insights and provide business recommendation to the business
A hacker‚Äôs mindset ‚Äì the ability to build simple but clever and elegant solutions to new problems within significant resource, operational and time constraints through deep understanding of the business, creative problem solving, and a wide range of expertise in data, analytics, automation, programming, and prototyping.
Excellent communicator with superior written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal communication skills.
Data driven in both decision making and performance measurement.
Extreme comfort in ambiguous, fast-paced environment.
Ability to multi-task, prioritize and coordinate resources.

It‚Äôs Great if you Have: 

MBA or Masters in a quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
Program management certifications (e.g. PMI, PRINCE2) to compliment your program management experience.
Asian market experience.
Travel industry / e-commerce / tech / consulting experience.

About the job
Hai Dehalova
Saat ini kami sedang mencari
SPV Warehouse - Penempatan Sigli

Warehouse Supervisor bertanggung jawab mengawasi seluruh kegiatan operasional gudang ‚Äî mulai dari penerimaan, penyimpanan, hingga distribusi barang ke outlet. Posisi ini menjadi penghubung penting antara tim central kitchen, purchasing, dan outlet untuk memastikan ketersediaan stok berjalan lancar, akurat, dan efisien.

Job Description:
Mengawasi dan memastikan seluruh aktivitas gudang berjalan sesuai SOP dan jadwal operasional.
Memastikan proses barang masuk dan keluar tercatat dengan akurat di sistem.
Mengatur tata letak, kebersihan, dan keamanan area penyimpanan.
Melakukan stock opname rutin dan memastikan kesesuaian antara stok fisik dan sistem.
Berkoordinasi dengan tim purchasing, central kitchen, dan outlet mengenai kebutuhan bahan atau pengiriman.
Mengatur dan membagi tugas kepada tim gudang agar proses berjalan efisien.
Menyusun laporan harian, mingguan, dan bulanan terkait stok, mutasi barang, serta retur.
Memastikan penerapan sistem FIFO/FEFO dalam penyimpanan barang, khususnya bahan makanan.
Melakukan analisis terhadap selisih stok dan potensi kehilangan barang (shrinkage).
Melakukan pembinaan, evaluasi, dan pengawasan kinerja staf gudang.

Kualifikasi:
Domisili Sigli
Pendidikan minimal D3/S1 Logistik, Manajemen, atau bidang terkait.
Pengalaman kerja minimal 2‚Äì3 tahun di bidang pergudangan/logistik, dengan minimal 1 tahun sebagai supervisor.
Menguasai prosedur penyimpanan dan distribusi barang F&B.
Memahami prinsip FIFO/FEFO, administrasi stok, dan stock opname.
Terbiasa menggunakan software inventory / sistem gudang (SAP, Accurate, iReap, Excel, dll).
Mampu bekerja dalam tim dan memiliki kemampuan leadership yang kuat.
Teliti, tegas, dan mampu bekerja di bawah tekanan.

What You'll Do

About the Role

Outsourced Pro Global is seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Loan Settlement Officer to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for ensuring the timely and accurate completion of Australian home loan settlements. You will coordinate with lenders, solicitors, and clients to manage settlement requirements and deliver a seamless end-to-end process.

Excellent written and verbal communication skills

job_description:
About the job
Persyaratan Pekerjaan

Sarjana Agroekoteknologi, Biologi, atau bidang terkait lainnya, Magister/Master menjadi nilai plus.
Lulusan baru dengan latar belakang akademik yang kuat dipersilakan melamar.
Pengalaman di bidang pertanian, fisiologi atau biologi (terutama di perusahaan perkebunan, laboratorium, atau lembaga penelitian pertanian) menjadi nilai tambah.
Memiliki pemahaman yang baik mengenai biologi, fisiologi dan pertanian.
Mampu menganalisis data, menyiapkan dokumentasi, dan mengomunikasikan hasil analisis secara efektif.
Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi dan kerja sama tim yang baik, teliti, dan terorganisir dengan baik.
Mampu berkomunikasi dalam Bahasa Inggris secara lisan dan tulisan.
Menguasai perangkat lunak dasar untuk pelaporan dan dokumentasi (seperti MS Excel, Word, dan software pencitraan gambar).
Memiliki jurnal yang dipublikasi atau pernah mengikuti seminar merupakan nilai tambah.

Deskripsi Pekerjaan

Menyediakan pengetahuan tentang sistem reproduksi tanaman, perkembangan embrio dan biji, dan untuk meningkatkan material tanaman dengan cara memodifikasinya.
Mengatur tanaman yang telah ada di nursery dan lapangan.
Mempelajari perkembangan embrio, endosperm dan biji di kelapa sawit dan berbagai abnormalitas yang muncul.
Mengembangkan protokol atau metode teknik Fisiologi.
Membuat percobaan kelapa sawit dan tanaman lainnya untuk mendukung Breeding.
Membuat produksi hibrida.
Berpartisipasi dalam uji coba penelitian untuk meningkatkan fisiologi dan teknik perbanyakan.
Memastikan seluruh aktivitas penanganan dan pengujian benih sesuai dengan standar industri dan SOP perusahaan.
Melakukan kunjungan lapangan ke nursery atau lapangan untuk memantau program kerja

job_title: Partner Sales Manager - Lark, Indonesia - APAC
job_description:
About the job
Responsibilities
About the Team
We are the driving force behind Lark's expansion in the APAC market. Our focus is on helping businesses embrace digital transformation through our collaboration solutions, and we're dedicated to identifying and seizing market opportunities while acquiring new customers to foster growth.

As a Partner Sales Manager under our Sales team in Lark APAC, you will help to acquire and enable new partners, construct business plans, ensure partner success and foster mutually beneficial relationships in alignment with Lark APAC's business strategy.

Join us if you're ready to be a part of this exciting journey and to make a tangible impact on business growth!

- You will work on strategy planning with your partners. You will need to closely collaborate with your partners to develop and enhance their strategy in alignment with Lark's GTM approach. Ensuring they focus on the appropriate target audience and employ the correct methodology.
- You will collaborate with acquired partners to construct business plans that align with Lark's overall business strategy and objectives, while ensuring that partner plans contribute to mutual growth and success.
- You will be involved in enablement and monitoring the partners' sales: You will work closely with the partner enablement manager to monitor the progress of partners' sales and pitching capabilities, and determine if any actions or interventions are needed.
- You will be responsible for sourcing, outreaching, and qualifying potential partners in target markets from time to time, ensuring a robust pipeline of partners. You will also execute strategies to acquire partners that align with Lark's business objectives.
- You will act as a main point of contact for partner-related operational matters; supporting partner operations by addressing partner inquiries, providing necessary information, and ensuring smooth collaboration.
- You will act as the primary interface between Lark and Partners' marketing teams, fostering collaboration and alignment of marketing strategies. Work jointly on marketing initiatives that enhance the visibility and success of both parties.
- You will strive to grow partners' pipelines by actively monitoring pipeline performance and identifying areas of improvement

Qualifications
Minimum Qualifications:
- You fully understand how partners operate in a SaaS model. Your track record includes proven experience in channel partner management, business development, or sales, preferably in the technology industry.
- You are a strategic thinker. You possess the ability to analyze data, identify trends, and develop actionable insights to drive business growth.
- You are a results-driven achiever. You exhibit a results-oriented mindset with a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets and KPIs.

About the job
Indonesia

Provincial Finance Officer - Papua

Organization

DT Global

Posted 5 Nov 2025 Closing date 17 Nov 2025

Location: Papua Region (Jayapura)

Program Background

Responsibilities

The SKALA Program is a significant Australian investment designed to help Indonesia address regional disparities in development. SKALA will contribute to this objective by strengthening selected elements of Indonesia‚Äôs large and complex decentralised government system responsible for the delivery of basic services (Layanan Dasar). The SKALA Program‚Äôs core approach is to facilitate better collaboration (Kolaborasi) between Indonesian government stakeholders, at national and subnational levels, to help realise synergies (Sinergi) that will trigger improved service delivery. Moreover, SKALA will build on, and take to scale, the successes and learning from Australia‚Äôs previous 19 years of support to Indonesia‚Äôs decentralised government system. The SKALA Program is to be implemented through the following three pillars:

Pillar 1: Stronger national level enabling environment for sub-national service delivery.

Pillar 2: Better sub-national governance for service delivery.

Pillar 3: Greater participation, representation and influence for women, people with disabilities and vulnerable groups.

SKALA is implemented at the national level with an office in Jakarta and at the subnational level with offices in Aceh, Nusa Tenggara Barat, Nusa Tenggara Timur, Maluku, Gorontalo, Kalimantan Utara, Tanah Papua. In addition to the 3 pillars, SKALA works across 4 general themes of Public Financial Management, Minimum Service Standards, Data and Analysis and GEDSI.

About DT Global Asia Pacific

At DT Global Asia Pacific, we aim to positively impact people‚Äôs lives through delivery excellence. As a leading implementing partner across Asia and the Pacific, we co-create locally led solutions in partnership with governments, communities, and stakeholders. We bring together talented teams and deep regional expertise to deliver initiatives that promote inclusive economic growth, essential services, and resilient, secure communities. With over 1,500 staff, experts in 22+ countries and more than 60 years of development experience, we tackle complex community, national and transnational challenges ‚Äî from governance and justice systems to climate resilience, infrastructure and social equity ‚Äî with innovative thinking and a commitment to long-term impact.

For more information, please see www.dt-global.com

The Role

The Provincial Finance Officer ‚Äì Papua provides day-to-day financial and administrative support to ensure transparent, accurate, and compliant financial management for SKALA‚Äôs Papua Provincial Office. The position reports to the Provincial Lead ‚Äì Papua and receives daily supervision from the Provincial Finance Coordinator ‚Äì Papua, and works closely with the Jakarta-based Finance and Compliance team.

About You

Specific Responsibilities

Financial Operations

Prepare and process payment requests and ensure completeness and compliance with SKALA Finance Manual.
Maintain petty cash for Papua office, record transactions, and prepare monthly reconciliation reports.
Support advance requests, acquittals, and monitor staff and consultant advances.
Assist in reviewing workshop and travel financial documentation and verifying supporting evidence.
Ensure timely and accurate filing of all financial records (both hard copy and digital).
Assist in the preparation of monthly financial reports for submission to the Finance Coordinator and Jakarta Finance Team.

Compliance and Monitoring

Ensure all provincial financial transactions comply with DT Global, DFAT, and SKALA financial policies.
Verify payment supporting documents, coding accuracy, and adherence to budget allocations.
Support internal audits, finance quality checks, and assist in implementing audit recommendations.
Monitor outstanding advances and ensure timely settlement.
Identify and report potential risks, irregularities, or fraud indicators to the Provincial Finance Coordinator and Province Lead ‚Äì Papua Region.

Coordination and Support

Liaise with Jakarta Finance Team for monthly closing, funds transfer, and other reporting requirements.
Provide support and advice to provincial staff on financial procedures and documentation.
Support activity budgeting and financial forecasts for events and fieldwork.
Coordinate with respective Papua‚Äôs Administration Officer and Operations and Procurement teams for payments and vendor documentation.

Other Duties

Comply with DFAT, DT Global and SKALA policies on gender, disability, fraud and anticorruption, child protection, PSEAH and the environment.
Ensure compliance and adherence to various operational policies, guidelines and manuals issued by DT Global and SKALA.
Proactively identify and manage risks within level of accountability.
Undertake other finance-related tasks as required by the program

Job Requirements

Work environment involves only infrequent exposure to disagreeable elements and minor physical exertion and/or strain.
Work may require long, and flexible hours as needed. Travel is based on need.

Relationship Management

The Provincial Finance Officer ‚Äì Papua reports to the Provincial Lead ‚Äì Papua and receives daily supervision from the Provincial Finance Coordinator ‚Äì Papua. The role works closely with the Provincial Operations Team, the Jakarta-based Finance and Compliance Unit, and external service providers including vendors, banks, and auditors.

job_title: Business Analyst (Supply Analytics, Bangkok-based, Relocation provided)
job_description:
About the job
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,‚ÄØenhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Our Purpose - Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (WITH RELOCATION PROVIDED)

Location: Bangkok, Thailand (*Not open for remote work)

Get to Know our Team:

As part of the Supply Analytics, you will be responsible for identifying new partners and opportunities, cultivating a relationship with them, and working together with them to deliver the best outcome for our end customers. You would also be responsible with managing the day-to-day interaction with the partner and working closely with other teams within Agoda to ensure the partners needs are met.

We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda‚Äôs unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.

The Opportunity: 

As a Business Analyst, you will report directly to either the Senior Manager or Associate Director within the Supply Department and this will be an individual contributor role. You will be responsible and fully empowered to work with the partners on the ground. You will be supported by a team within the Supply department and work closely with other Team members within Agoda.

In this Role, you‚Äôll get to:

Translate internal briefs into analytical projects (to include refining the initial brief and asking the ‚Äòright questions‚Äô, working through potential hypotheses and storyboarding the output)
Use and analyze data from multiple large-scale data warehouses and present statistically strong analysis to a wide range of business stakeholders.
Proactively identify opportunities for growth within supply and the wider business.
Drive new analytical initiatives and projects aimed at improving organizational efficiency and shaping Agoda supply.
Identify, support, and lead projects aimed at scaling up the way the Supply organization leverages on data, insights, and intelligence.
Automate manual operational processes and present back on time savings gained through modernization of business operations

What you‚Äôll Need to Succeed:

At least 2-5+ years of experience working as an Analyst with experience in analytics/data science/insights/strategy/BI
Advanced working knowledge and hands-on experience in SQL
Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in data visualization tools such as Tableau (preferably) 
Expert domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, Python (or R)
Bachelor‚Äôs degree ideally in a business or quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
A good understanding of statistical modelling knowledge or any machine learning technique knowledge (such as hypothesis testing, regression, logistic regression, random forest, etc.)
Good stakeholder management experience. Comfortable presenting to senior leadership and C-suite.
Experience in conducting A/B testing experimentation
Strong experience in finding data insights and provide business recommendation to the business
A hacker‚Äôs mindset ‚Äì the ability to build simple but clever and elegant solutions to new problems within significant resource, operational and time constraints through deep understanding of the business, creative problem solving, and a wide range of expertise in data, analytics, automation, programming, and prototyping.
Excellent communicator with superior written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal communication skills.
Data driven in both decision making and performance measurement.
Extreme comfort in ambiguous, fast-paced environment.
Ability to multi-task, prioritize and coordinate resources.

It‚Äôs Great if you Have: 

MBA or Masters in a quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
Program management certifications (e.g. PMI, PRINCE2) to compliment your program management experience.
Asian market experience.
Travel industry / e-commerce / tech / consulting experience.

About the job
Company Description
Mayang Collection Indonesia adalah brand ritel fashion lokal yang berdedikasi menyediakan koleksi pakaian wanita yang modis dan berkualitas tinggi. Berdiri sejak tahun 2000, kami telah mengukir reputasi sebagai merek yang tepercaya di industri fashion tanah air.

Lahir dan berkembang di kota Malang, Mayang Collection kini telah berkembang pesat dengan mengoperasikan 34 outlet di seluruh Pulau Jawa, didukung oleh tim solid yang terdiri dari lebih dari 200 anggota. Skala ini membuktikan komitmen kami terhadap pertumbuhan dan aksesibilitas produk.

Kami berkomitmen penuh untuk memberdayakan wanita Indonesia dengan menghadirkan busana yang memadukan kenyamanan superior dengan kepercayaan diri. Koleksi kami mencakup ragam pilihan, mulai dari tunik kasual yang stylish, dress elegan, hijab, hingga aksesoris yang melengkapi penampilan wanita.

Marketplace Daily Ops: Mengelola listing produk, stock, voucher, dan tampilan toko secara keseluruhan.

Pengalaman min. 2 tahun di E-Commerce, dengan track record managing Live Shopping.
Sangat mahir mengoperasikan Seller Center dan tools periklanan di marketplace utama.
Paham alur kerja Live Streaming dan faktor-faktor kunci keberhasilannya.

job_title: Senior Sales Executive ‚Äî Wealth & Deposits (Finetiks VIP Save)

About the job
About Finetiks
Finetiks is a licensed fintech company regulated by the Financial Services Authority of Indonesia (OJK). We partner with trusted banks to offer market-leading financial products that help Indonesians build great financial habits and live financially well.
Our flagship product, Finetiks VIP Save, is a digital savings account offering a market-leading up to 6.25% p.a. interest, with no fees, backed by Bank Victoria International ‚Äî a reputable commercial bank with over 30 years of experience and nearly 40 branches across Indonesia.

Role Overview
We are looking for a proven relationship-driven sales professional with a strong background in selling savings, deposits, insurance, or wealth management products to high-net-worth individuals (HNWIs).
The ideal candidate already has a trusted personal network of premium clients and can leverage these relationships to grow the savings under management (SUM) at Finetiks.
You will play a key role in driving Finetiks VIP Save‚Äôs deposit growth by acquiring affluent customers, deepening relationships, and developing referral and partnership channels.

Key Responsibilities
Sales & Growth
Develop and execute a clear strategy to increase savings and deposits held in Finetiks VIP Save.
Achieve and exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets aligned with company growth goals.
Identify, approach, and convert high-value customers through your existing client network.
Relationship Management

Provide tailored financial solutions that meet clients‚Äô savings and wealth management needs.
Deliver an exceptional customer experience that builds trust and advocacy.

Qualifications & Experience

We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Shipping Agency Staff to be the operational pivot for our vessel and cargo handling services. This role is crucial in managing all aspects of a ship's port call, ensuring compliance, efficiency, and exceptional service delivery to our principals.

Key Responsibilities (Daily and Core Duties)

Coordinate and supervise all aspects of vessel arrivals and departures, including pilotage, tugs, and berthing.
Oversee and optimize Husbandry Services for vessels (e.g., crew change, provisioning, bunkering, medical assistance, and coordination of minor repairs) ensuring timely and efficient port calls.
Manage and monitor the vessels Clear-In and Clear-Out processes with port authorities.
Act as the primary liaison with Port Authorities, Customs, Immigration, Quarantine, and other relevant government bodies to ensure full legal and maritime compliance.
Maintain an up-to-date working knowledge of Indonesian maritime regulations and port procedures.
Ensure accurate and timely processing of all cargo documentation, such as Bills of Lading, Manifests, and Delivery Orders.
Monitor and supervise cargo loading and unloading operations to ensure efficiency, safety, and adherence to established procedures and deadlines.
Manage depot operations and equipment utilization effectively, optimizing resource allocation.
Prepare and submit accurate operational reports (including EPDA and Departure Reports) to principals and internal departments promptly.
Foster strong relationships with principals, clients, and internal departments.
Address and resolve operational issues promptly and effectively.
Contribute to team development and operational oversight.

Requirements

Education: Minimum Bachelor's degree (S1) in Shipping, Maritime Studies, or a relevant field.
Experience: Proven experience of 2 years in a similar role within a shipping agency or related maritime industry.
Language Proficiency: Proficiency in English (both written and verbal) is mandatory for international communication. Mandarin Chinese (written, verbal, and reading) is highly advantageous due to extensive communication with global partners.
Legal Knowledge: In-depth knowledge of Indonesian maritime regulations, port procedures, customs, and immigration protocols.
Attitude & Skills: Exceptional problem-solving abilities, a proactive attitude, and strong teamwork capabilities.
Commitment: Strong commitment to work arrangements and a flexible approach to dynamic operational demands (working outside standard hours may be required).
Able to join ASAP

Important Note On Employment Status

This position is offered under an outsourcing employment arrangement. Successful candidates will be employed by a third-party outsourcing company and assigned to work full-time at PT. Sinotrans Overseas Indonesia. Candidates must be willing to work under this specific employment structure.

Why Join Us?

At PT. Sinotrans Overseas Indonesia, we offer a challenging yet rewarding environment where your expertise will be valued, and your career growth will be supported through exposure to complex and high-volume operations. If you're a dedicated professional ready to make a significant impact on global logistics, we encourage you to apply!

Apply Today!

About the job
ELVTR is a premier online education platform specializing in live courses led by industry experts from global companies such as Nike, Netflix, Google, and more. Since our establishment in 2020, we have grown from a small team to 140 talented members, delivering education to over 17,000 students worldwide. We are currently expanding our team in South Africa to support our growing presence and impact.

Position Overview:

ELVTR is on the hunt for a sharp, results-oriented Business Development Representative to help convert highly engaged leads into enthusiastic customers. You won't need to chase cold leads‚Äîyour job is to close warm prospects who've already scheduled their calls. If you're passionate about high-ticket sales and want to earn what you're worth, this role is for you.

This is a full-time, fully remote position open to candidates based in Indonesia.

This job is for you if you are:

A born closer who thrives under pressure and doesn't just meet targets‚Äîyou crush them
Strategic in your approach, with a deep understanding of buyer psychology
Self-directed and disciplined in a remote work setup
A collaborator who brings value to your team while owning your individual results

Responsibilities:

Convert warm, pre-qualified leads into enrolled students for our premium courses
Build rapport with prospects and identify how our programs align with their goals
Track your metrics and iterate fast to exceed conversion benchmarks
Maintain clean and detailed records in our CRM
Communicate customer insights to marketing and product teams for continuous improvement
Coordinate with internal departments to ensure a seamless customer journey

Requirements

Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field
Fluent, professional English communication skills
Strong grasp of CRM tools and digital sales platforms
Ability to adapt to a fast-paced environment and retain product knowledge quickly
Confidence, curiosity, and excellent listening skills
A history of high performance in quota-carrying roles is a strong plus

Benefits

High earning potential with competitive base pay + uncapped commissions and bonuses
Mental health coverage, fitness reimbursements, generous vacation policy, and access to all ELVTR courses
A performance-driven, supportive culture that celebrates wins and encourages growth. 

Why You Should Join ELVTR:

 You'll be part of something bigger. We're not just selling courses‚Äîwe're building a movement to raise the standard of online education. Every enrollment you drive helps someone take real steps toward career transformation
 We move fast, and you grow faster. ELVTR is scaling quickly, and we promote from within. If you bring results, you'll earn trust, autonomy, and opportunities‚Äîfast. You won't have to wait years to make your mark
 Work with sharp, driven people‚Äîevery single day. Our team is high-performing, tight-knit, and serious about impact. You'll never be the smartest person in the room, and that's a good thing

Join Us:

Do you have the drive and skill set to excel in a high-ticket sales environment? Are you ready to be part of a team as committed to closing deals as they are to transforming the landscape of online education? If so, apply now and elevate your career with ELVTR.

Due to the high volume of applications, we will only be able to respond to candidates with whom we are interested in moving forward. We appreciate your understanding and look forward to reviewing your application.

ELVTR is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all team members.

Recruitment fraud is a scheme in which fictitious job opportunities are offered to job seekers typically through online services, such as false websites, or through unsolicited emails claiming to be from the company. These emails may request recipients to provide personal information or to make payments as part of their illegitimate recruiting process. DXC does not make offers of employment via social media networks and DXC never asks for any money or payments from applicants at any point in the recruitment process, nor ask a job seeker to purchase IT or other equipment on our behalf. More information on employment scams is available here.

About the job
Indonesia

Regional Public Finance Management Specialist

Organization

DT Global

Posted 5 Nov 2025 Closing date 19 Nov 2025

Location: Remote

Program Background

Responsibilities

The SKALA Program is a significant Australian investment designed to help Indonesia address regional disparities in development. SKALA will contribute to this objective by strengthening selected elements of Indonesia‚Äôs large and complex decentralised government system responsible for the delivery of basic services (Layanan Dasar). The SKALA Program‚Äôs core approach is to facilitate better collaboration (Kolaborasi) between Indonesian government stakeholders, at national and subnational levels, to help realise synergies (Sinergi) that will trigger improved service delivery. Moreover, SKALA will build on, and take to scale, the successes and learning from Australia‚Äôs previous 19 years of support to Indonesia‚Äôs decentralised government system. The SKALA Program is to be implemented through the following three pillars:

Pillar 1: Stronger national level enabling environment for sub-national service delivery.
Pillar 2: Better sub-national governance for service delivery.
Pillar 3: Greater participation, representation and influence for women, people with disabilities and vulnerable groups.

SKALA is implemented at the national level with an office in Jakarta and at the subnational level with offices in Aceh, Nusa Tenggara Barat, Nusa Tenggara Timur, Maluku, Gorontalo, Kalimantan Utara, Tanah Papua. In addition to the 3 pillars, SKALA works across 4 general themes of Public Financial Management, Minimum Service Standards, Data and Analysis and GEDSI.

About DT Global Asia Pacific

At DT Global Asia Pacific, we aim to positively impact people‚Äôs lives through delivery excellence. As a leading implementing partner across Asia and the Pacific, we co-create locally led solutions in partnership with governments, communities, and stakeholders. We bring together talented teams and deep regional expertise to deliver initiatives that promote inclusive economic growth, essential services, and resilient, secure communities. With over 1,500 staff, experts in 22+ countries and more than 60 years of development experience, we tackle complex community, national and transnational challenges ‚Äî from governance and justice systems to climate resilience, infrastructure and social equity ‚Äî with innovative thinking and a commitment to long-term impact.

For more information, please see www.dt-global.com

job_description:
About the job
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,‚ÄØenhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Our Purpose - Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (WITH RELOCATION PROVIDED)

Location: Bangkok, Thailand (*Not open for remote work)

Get to Know our Team:

As part of the Supply Analytics, you will be responsible for identifying new partners and opportunities, cultivating a relationship with them, and working together with them to deliver the best outcome for our end customers. You would also be responsible with managing the day-to-day interaction with the partner and working closely with other teams within Agoda to ensure the partners needs are met.

We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda‚Äôs unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.

The Opportunity: 

As a Business Analyst, you will report directly to either the Senior Manager or Associate Director within the Supply Department and this will be an individual contributor role. You will be responsible and fully empowered to work with the partners on the ground. You will be supported by a team within the Supply department and work closely with other Team members within Agoda.

In this Role, you‚Äôll get to:

Translate internal briefs into analytical projects (to include refining the initial brief and asking the ‚Äòright questions‚Äô, working through potential hypotheses and storyboarding the output)
Use and analyze data from multiple large-scale data warehouses and present statistically strong analysis to a wide range of business stakeholders.
Proactively identify opportunities for growth within supply and the wider business.
Drive new analytical initiatives and projects aimed at improving organizational efficiency and shaping Agoda supply.
Identify, support, and lead projects aimed at scaling up the way the Supply organization leverages on data, insights, and intelligence.
Automate manual operational processes and present back on time savings gained through modernization of business operations

What you‚Äôll Need to Succeed:

At least 2-5+ years of experience working as an Analyst with experience in analytics/data science/insights/strategy/BI
Advanced working knowledge and hands-on experience in SQL
Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in data visualization tools such as Tableau (preferably) 
Expert domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, Python (or R)
Bachelor‚Äôs degree ideally in a business or quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
A good understanding of statistical modelling knowledge or any machine learning technique knowledge (such as hypothesis testing, regression, logistic regression, random forest, etc.)
Good stakeholder management experience. Comfortable presenting to senior leadership and C-suite.
Experience in conducting A/B testing experimentation
Strong experience in finding data insights and provide business recommendation to the business
A hacker‚Äôs mindset ‚Äì the ability to build simple but clever and elegant solutions to new problems within significant resource, operational and time constraints through deep understanding of the business, creative problem solving, and a wide range of expertise in data, analytics, automation, programming, and prototyping.
Excellent communicator with superior written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal communication skills.
Data driven in both decision making and performance measurement.
Extreme comfort in ambiguous, fast-paced environment.
Ability to multi-task, prioritize and coordinate resources.

It‚Äôs Great if you Have: 

MBA or Masters in a quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
Program management certifications (e.g. PMI, PRINCE2) to compliment your program management experience.
Asian market experience.
Travel industry / e-commerce / tech / consulting experience.

About the job
Indonesia

Capacity Development and Training Specialist

Organization

DT Global

Posted 5 Nov 2025 Closing date 19 Nov 2025

Location: Remote

Program Background

Responsibilities

The SKALA Program is a significant Australian investment designed to help Indonesia address regional disparities in development. SKALA will contribute to this objective by strengthening selected elements of Indonesia‚Äôs large and complex decentralised government system responsible for the delivery of basic services (Layanan Dasar). The SKALA Program‚Äôs core approach is to facilitate better collaboration (Kolaborasi) between Indonesian government stakeholders, at national and subnational levels, to help realise synergies (Sinergi) that will trigger improved service delivery. Moreover, SKALA will build on, and take to scale, the successes and learning from Australia‚Äôs previous 19 years of support to Indonesia‚Äôs decentralised government system. The SKALA Program is to be implemented through the following three pillars:

Pillar 1: Stronger national level enabling environment for sub-national service delivery.
Pillar 2: Better sub-national governance for service delivery.
Pillar 3: Greater participation, representation and influence for women, people with disabilities and vulnerable groups.

SKALA is implemented at the national level with an office in Jakarta and at the subnational level with offices in Aceh, Nusa Tenggara Barat, Nusa Tenggara Timur, Maluku, Gorontalo, Kalimantan Utara, Tanah Papua. In addition to the 3 pillars, SKALA works across 4 general themes of Public Financial Management, Minimum Service Standards, Data and Analysis and GEDSI.

About DT Global Asia Pacific

At DT Global Asia Pacific, we aim to positively impact people‚Äôs lives through delivery excellence. As a leading implementing partner across Asia and the Pacific, we co-create locally led solutions in partnership with governments, communities, and stakeholders. We bring together talented teams and deep regional expertise to deliver initiatives that promote inclusive economic growth, essential services, and resilient, secure communities. With over 1,500 staff, experts in 22+ countries and more than 60 years of development experience, we tackle complex community, national and transnational challenges ‚Äî from governance and justice systems to climate resilience, infrastructure and social equity ‚Äî with innovative thinking and a commitment to long-term impact.

For more information, please see www.dt-global.com

The Role

Capacity Development and Training Specialist will assist SKALA and its government counterparts, especially the MoHA-Pusdatin (Ministry of Home Affairs, Center of Data and Information), in enhancing and scaling the One Data Policy, Planning Budgeting System (SIPD ‚Äì Sistem Informasi Pemerintahan Daerah), and its implementation at the sub-national level. The Consultant will assist SKALA to support MoHA Pusdatin to design capacity-building on the use of SIPD, develop curriculum and training modules, and conduct training-for-trainers for related stakeholders at SKALA supported provinces.

The consultant will provide technical advice and skills to conduct a capacity-building needs assessment, facilitate capacity-building design and development of curricula and training modules, and train the SKALA supported provinces‚Äô trainers. The Consultant will work with other technical Data and Analytics teams to ensure coherence, provide support, and provide input to ministries' counterparts.

Click on the link or copy paste it to access the full Terms of Reference for this position:

https://tinyurl.com/5n8mb3mv

About You

Specific Responsibilities

 Assessment of the capacity of local/sub-national government in the implementation of One Data, use of the SIPD system and its connection to the data and analysis system, i.e. SEPAKAT, SIKD.
Development of capacity building design in consultation with MoHA and SKALA supported province governments.
Develop training curricula and modules for Regional One Data implementation and use of SIPD
Support the development of e-tutorial for SIPD utilization.
Facilitate training of trainers (ToT) for One Data Implementation in SKALA-supported provinces.
Supporting SKALA‚Äôs sub-national team assisting local governments (provinces and oversight to districts/cities) on SIPD and one data implementation.
Supporting the sub-national team to assist provincial governments in Tanah Papua on the enhancement of One Data implementation, including in the development and or review of local regulations, action plan, priority data, etc.
Facilitating MoHA-Pusdatin collaboration with other ministries related to development of executive dashboard for 12 Presidential Priority programs monitoring.
Support the knowledge sharing on one data implementation.
Perform other tasks required in coordination with supervisor.

Other Duties

Comply with DFAT, DT Global and SKALA policies on gender, disability, fraud and anticorruption, child protection, PSEAH and the environment.
Ensure compliance and adherence to various operational policies, guidelines and manuals issued by DT Global and SKALA.

Job Requirements

Work environment involves only infrequent exposure to disagreeable elements and minor physical exertion and/or strain.
Work may require long, and flexible hours as needed. Travel is based on need.

Deliverables

 Initial Report on assessment of sub-national government capacity on Regional One Data implementation.
Finalized design on Regional One Data implementation capacity building designed, consulted with MOHA and SKALA.
Training curriculum and modules for Regional One Data implementation and use of SIPD
Documented technical input on development of e-tutorial of SIPD utilization
Documented facilitation of training of trainers
Documented technical support for Regional One Data implementation at SKALA supported provinces, including in Tanah Papua
Documented technical consultation, workshop/meetings, and discussions with Pusdatin and other relevant stakeholders (other Ministries/Institutions/Sub-national stakeholders).
Documented support in facilitating knowledge building

Relationship Management

job_title: BI Analyst (Supply Analytics, Bangkok-based, Relocation provided)
job_description:
About the job
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,‚ÄØenhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Our Purpose - Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (WITH RELOCATION PROVIDED)

Location: Bangkok, Thailand (*Not open for remote work)

Get to Know our Team:

As part of the Supply Analytics, you will be responsible for identifying new partners and opportunities, cultivating a relationship with them, and working together with them to deliver the best outcome for our end customers. You would also be responsible with managing the day-to-day interaction with the partner and working closely with other teams within Agoda to ensure the partners needs are met.

We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda‚Äôs unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.

The Opportunity: 

As a BI Analyst, you will report directly to either the Senior Manager or Associate Director within the Supply Department and this will be an individual contributor role. You will be responsible and fully empowered to work with the partners on the ground. You will be supported by a team within the Supply department and work closely with other Team members within Agoda.

In this Role, you‚Äôll get to:

Translate internal briefs into analytical projects (to include refining the initial brief and asking the ‚Äòright questions‚Äô, working through potential hypotheses and storyboarding the output)
Use and analyze data from multiple large-scale data warehouses and present statistically strong analysis to a wide range of business stakeholders.
Proactively identify opportunities for growth within supply and the wider business.
Drive new analytical initiatives and projects aimed at improving organizational efficiency and shaping Agoda supply.
Identify, support, and lead projects aimed at scaling up the way the Supply organization leverages on data, insights, and intelligence.
Automate manual operational processes and present back on time savings gained through modernization of business operations

What you‚Äôll Need to Succeed:

At least 2-5+ years of experience working as an Analyst with experience in analytics/data science/insights/strategy/BI
Advanced working knowledge and hands-on experience in SQL
Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in data visualization tools such as Tableau (preferably) 
Expert domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, Python (or R)
Bachelor‚Äôs degree ideally in a business or quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
A good understanding of statistical modelling knowledge or any machine learning technique knowledge (such as hypothesis testing, regression, logistic regression, random forest, etc.)
Good stakeholder management experience. Comfortable presenting to senior leadership and C-suite.
Experience in conducting A/B testing experimentation
Strong experience in finding data insights and provide business recommendation to the business
A hacker‚Äôs mindset ‚Äì the ability to build simple but clever and elegant solutions to new problems within significant resource, operational and time constraints through deep understanding of the business, creative problem solving, and a wide range of expertise in data, analytics, automation, programming, and prototyping.
Excellent communicator with superior written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal communication skills.
Data driven in both decision making and performance measurement.
Extreme comfort in ambiguous, fast-paced environment.
Ability to multi-task, prioritize and coordinate resources.

It‚Äôs Great if you Have: 

MBA or Masters in a quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
Program management certifications (e.g. PMI, PRINCE2) to compliment your program management experience.
Asian market experience.
Travel industry / e-commerce / tech / consulting experience.

About the job
Job Title: Data AI Engineer (Middle Level: 3‚Äì5 Years of Experience)
Location: Jakarta - Full WFO
Department: Data & Technology
Employment Type: Contract (6 months, extendable) - Immediate Hiring

About the Role
We are seeking a skilled Data AI Engineer to strengthen our data-driven decision-making, model development, and AI implementation initiatives across business units. This role will focus on developing, training, and deploying production-grade machine learning models that support the company‚Äôs digital transformation roadmap, including AI automation, recommendation systems, and predictive analytics.

Responsibilities
Collect, clean, and preprocess large structured and unstructured datasets.
Develop, validate, and deploy machine learning and AI models for prediction, classification, clustering, and recommendation purposes.
Collaborate with engineering and business teams to translate requirements into data-driven insights and AI solutions.
Monitor, optimize, and maintain deployed models to ensure performance and reliability.
Build and manage data pipelines and feature stores for production models.
Conduct exploratory data analysis (EDA) to identify patterns, trends, and opportunities.
Document methodologies and present analytical findings to non-technical stakeholders.
Support the development of the company‚Äôs AI strategy and contribute to innovation initiatives.

Minimum Requirements
Bachelor‚Äôs Degree (S1) in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (mandatory).
Minimum 3 years of experience as a Data Scientist or Machine Learning Engineer.
Excellent command of Python, SQL, and key data libraries (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, or PyTorch).
Strong understanding of machine learning algorithms, model evaluation, and feature engineering.
Experience with data visualization tools such as Power BI, Tableau, Plotly, or Matplotlib/Seaborn.
Working knowledge of cloud-based AI platforms (AWS SageMaker, GCP Vertex AI, or Azure ML).
Familiarity with ETL processes, data pipelines, and MLOps concepts (Docker, Airflow, MLflow, CI/CD for ML).
Knowledge of big data frameworks (Spark, Databricks, etc.) is a plus.
Solid understanding of data governance, security, and privacy compliance.
Training or certification in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, or Data Engineering preferred.
Proficiency in both Indonesian and English (spoken and written).

About the job
About Company
PT Grand Indonesia is a privately owned company and a subsidiary of Djarum Group, which manages four business units:

1. Grand Indonesia Shopping Mall, a premium shopping center that offers an International shopping experience and a wide range of fashion apparel, restaurants, and entertainment choices.
2. Hotel Indonesia Kempinski Jakarta, a historic landmark hotel of Indonesia.
3. Kempinski Private Residences, a first-class serviced residential tower jointly managed with Kempinski Hoteliers.
4. Menara BCA, a 56 storey-premium-grade office tower that host multinational companies

Currently PT. Grand Indonesia is looking for an Interior Design Assistant Manager with the following requirements:

Qualifications:
Bachelor‚Äôs Degree majoring in Interior Design from a reputable university.
Minimum 3 years of experience as an interior designer in the design consultant/property industry/commercial/retail.
Proficiency in computer, especially design software, and programs, i.e., AutoCAD, Photoshop, SketchUp, 3DMax, Rendering (VRay/Lumion/Enscape), and other AI applications, MS Office, and MS Projects.
Proficiency in Indonesian and English language, both oral and written
Positive attitude, team collaborator, good sourcing skills, and eye for detailing.
 Job Descriptions:
Undertake design project from concept to completion, including producing sample and mood boards, 2D and 3D drawings, visuals, and renderings.
Interpret and translate needs into rough plans and designs.
Research and decide on materials and product sourcing.
Define project requirements and schedules.
Provide bill of quantity and project fees according to budget.
Supervise work progress regularly and resolve any technical difficulties and any other problems that may arise.
Coordinate externally with architects, designers, and contractors on all issues about the design and construction phase and internally with the related department.
Ensure all assigned projects adhere to quality, health, and safety regulations.
Ensure the smooth progress and completion of projects within budget, time, and quality standards.
There will be opportunities to work in both areas of the business (interior and architecture/fit-out) within the corporate/building complex.
Research and follow industry changes, evolutions, and best practices.

job_title: Senior Local Planning and Data Governance Specialist
job_description:
About the job
Indonesia

Senior Local Planning and Data Governance Specialist

Organization

DT Global

Posted 5 Nov 2025 Closing date 19 Nov 2025

Location: Remote

Program Background

Responsibilities

The SKALA Program is a significant Australian investment designed to help Indonesia address regional disparities in development. SKALA will contribute to this objective by strengthening selected elements of Indonesia‚Äôs large and complex decentralised government system responsible for the delivery of basic services (Layanan Dasar). The SKALA Program‚Äôs core approach is to facilitate better collaboration (Kolaborasi) between Indonesian government stakeholders, at national and subnational levels, to help realise synergies (Sinergi) that will trigger improved service delivery. Moreover, SKALA will build on, and take to scale, the successes and learning from Australia‚Äôs previous 19 years of support to Indonesia‚Äôs decentralised government system. The SKALA Program is to be implemented through the following three pillars:

Pillar 1: Stronger national level enabling environment for sub-national service delivery.
Pillar 2: Better sub-national governance for service delivery.
Pillar 3: Greater participation, representation and influence for women, people with disabilities and vulnerable groups.

SKALA is implemented at the national level with an office in Jakarta and at the subnational level with offices in Aceh, Nusa Tenggara Barat, Nusa Tenggara Timur, Maluku, Gorontalo, Kalimantan Utara, Tanah Papua. In addition to the 3 pillars, SKALA works across 4 general themes of Public Financial Management, Minimum Service Standards, Data and Analysis and GEDSI.

About DT Global Asia Pacific

At DT Global Asia Pacific, we aim to positively impact people‚Äôs lives through delivery excellence. As a leading implementing partner across Asia and the Pacific, we co-create locally led solutions in partnership with governments, communities, and stakeholders. We bring together talented teams and deep regional expertise to deliver initiatives that promote inclusive economic growth, essential services, and resilient, secure communities. With over 1,500 staff, experts in 22+ countries and more than 60 years of development experience, we tackle complex community, national and transnational challenges ‚Äî from governance and justice systems to climate resilience, infrastructure and social equity ‚Äî with innovative thinking and a commitment to long-term impact.

For more information, please see www.dt-global.com

The Role

The Senior Local Planning and Data Governance Specialist will support SKALA and its government counterparts, such as Bappenas, MOHA and MOF by providing technical input to improve socio-economic based data analysis using DTSEN to be included in web application SEPAKAT (Bappenas) and interop with other systems such as SIPD (MOHA) and SIKD (MOF). The Consultant will also provide technical input to enhance SEPAKAT utilization through the development of Executive Dashboards for high level officials and line ministries (KL) in developing evidence-based program planning and targeting to address basic services needs and poverty reduction.The Consultant will collaborate closely with SKALA‚Äôs GEDSI, PFM, and MSS teams at both national and sub-national levels to ensure coherence, synergy, and effective integration of data into planning and budgeting processes.

Click on the link or copy paste it to access the full Terms of Reference for this position:

https://tinyurl.com/4f4sze9y

About You

Specific Responsibilities

 Provide technical input for the development and enhancement of exeutive dashboards for high level officials including Ministers and Echelon I, byutilizing DTSEN, macro data and central government data to support evidence-based decision-making.
Provide technical input to adjust and refine SEPAKAT features and menus for macro and micro socio-economic data analysis, ensuring practical use for planning and budgeting at national and sub-national levels for poverty reduction and access to basic services (referring to SPM indicators).
Provide mapping of the condition of Village Information System in Tanah Papua and assist the governance of OAP data in Village Information System and its existence in socio-economic data ecosystems.
Provide policy and technical advisory to the current design of local institutional setting for the utilisation of SEPAKAT and its integration to other existing government system, including with locally generated data systems, i.e. regional data portal
Advisory input in the national policy in related to data governance, use of micro socio-economic data including through but not limited to SEPAKAT and SIPD.
Provide technical input on the identification and analytical process and variable of several development indicators, such as poverty, midterm development planning, MSS, climate change, etc to be processed through SEPAKAT and data portal system.
Support the development curriculum matrix, syllabus, and training modules for SEPAKAT utilization in consultation with key ministries related and relevant SKALA unit.
Provide input as requested by supervisor.

Other Duties

Comply with DFAT, DT Global and SKALA policies on gender, disability, fraud and anticorruption, child protection, PSEAH and the environment.
Ensure compliance and adherence to various operational policies, guidelines and manuals issued by DT Global and SKALA.

Job Requirements

Work environment involves only infrequent exposure to disagreeable elements and minor physical exertion and/or strain.
Work may require long, and flexible hours as needed. Travel is based on need.

Deliverables

Documented technical input for the development and enhancement of leadership dashboards at Ministerial and Echelon I levels, utilizing DTSEN and other central government data (SIKD, e-SPM, SIPD)
Documented input on the adjustment and refinement of SEPAKAT features and menus for micro socio-economic data analysis, ensuring usability for national and sub-national planning and budgeting.
Documented input on the GEDSI analysis, including design, data sources and analysis formula to be applied in the SEPAKAT system, that includes but not limited to MSS, poverty, midterm development documents, geo-tagging, climate change issues, etc.
Inventory of planning and budgeting analysis and required data necessary for digital platform, including SEPAKAT, SIPD (e-walidata & e-database) and Regional Data Portal.
Documented input to design guidelines, user manual, and training modules for for the preparation and implementation of socio-economic data updating.
Documented input to curriculum matrix, syllabus and training modules for use of micro socio-economic data (through SEPAKAT, SIPD, data portal) training in consultation with key ministries related and relevant SKALA unit.
Documented input on development and scaling out of village information system in Tanah Papua and integrated socio-economic data (DTSEN) with disaggregated information on OAP and Non-OAP for Otsus based planning.

Relationship Management

The role will be working closely with the Data and Analytics unit and Government counterparts, under close coordination and reporting to the Data and Analytic Lead.

Selection Criteria

Essential

Master‚Äôs degree in Social Sciences, Development Studies, Political Science, Business Administration or related subjects and at least has 15 years experiences;
Demonstrate skills and experiences on poverty, MSS, budget and realization and GEDSI data analysis and the use of SEPAKAT, data portal and executive dashboard system;
Familiarity of information systems used by sub-national governments in planning and budgeting, i.e. SIPD, e-SPM, e-walidata, data portal and SIPD-Hub;
Demonstrate skills and experiences on local planning and budgeting process and link with one data governance and use of relevant analysis;
Demonstrate skills and experience in the micro data processing and use for provision basic services and social protection targeting;
Experience in development of training curriculum, syllabus, modules and the use of Learning Management System (LMS).
Experienced working on governance program involving government and development partners;
Able to analyse and present complex information; strong presentation, communications and writing skills in both English and Bahasa Indonesia;
Proven record of strong performance working in teams (teamwork) as well as working independently to deliver quality work.
Fluency in Bahasa Indonesia and English languages
Understanding of gender equality and social inclusion issues.

Preferred

Experienced working on community development projects involving government and development partners, especially related to social protection for people with disabilities.
Experienced working with Government of Indonesia.

How to apply

How To Apply

Click the link to apply: Senior Local Planning and Data Governance Specialist

Please submit

 Your CV
 A cover letter addressing the selection criteria

APPLICATIONS CLOSE Wednesday, 19 November 2025, max 5 PM Jakarta Time

As part of our commitment to inclusion, we actively encourage applications from people with disabilities (PWDs). We are also committed to providing reasonable accommodation throughout the recruitment process and in the workplace to support the success and well-being of employees with disabilities. Candidates requiring any adjustments to participate equitably, may contact SKALA People & Culture unit at recruitment@skala.or.id and we will work with the candidate to find the right solution. This information is strictly confidential; used solely to strengthen our inclusive hiring efforts and ensure we provide any support needed. Your disclosure will not impact on recruitment decisions.

Should this role be of interest, we encourage you to apply as soon as possible. Kindly note only shortlisted applicants will be contacted.

DT Global is committed to child protection and safeguarding the welfare of children in the delivery of our international development programs. We are committed to Safety and the Prevention of Sexual Abuse and Harassment (PSEAH), and bribery prevention. DT Global is an equal opportunity employer and we encourage women, men, people with diverse backgrounds and people living with disabilities to apply. This program is funded by the Australian Government and Managed by DT Global.

job_title: BI Developer (Supply Analytics, Bangkok-based, Relocation provided)
job_description:
About the job
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,‚ÄØenhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Our Purpose - Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (WITH RELOCATION PROVIDED)

Location: Bangkok, Thailand (*Not open for remote work)

Get to Know our Team:

As part of the Supply Analytics, you will be responsible for identifying new partners and opportunities, cultivating a relationship with them, and working together with them to deliver the best outcome for our end customers. You would also be responsible with managing the day-to-day interaction with the partner and working closely with other teams within Agoda to ensure the partners needs are met.

We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda‚Äôs unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.

The Opportunity: 

As a BI Developer, you will report directly to either the Senior Manager or Associate Director within the Supply Department and this will be an individual contributor role. You will be responsible and fully empowered to work with the partners on the ground. You will be supported by a team within the Supply department and work closely with other Team members within Agoda.

In this Role, you‚Äôll get to:

Translate internal briefs into analytical projects (to include refining the initial brief and asking the ‚Äòright questions‚Äô, working through potential hypotheses and storyboarding the output)
Use and analyze data from multiple large-scale data warehouses and present statistically strong analysis to a wide range of business stakeholders.
Proactively identify opportunities for growth within supply and the wider business.
Drive new analytical initiatives and projects aimed at improving organizational efficiency and shaping Agoda supply.
Identify, support, and lead projects aimed at scaling up the way the Supply organization leverages on data, insights, and intelligence.
Automate manual operational processes and present back on time savings gained through modernization of business operations

What you‚Äôll Need to Succeed:

At least 2-5+ years of experience working as an Analyst with experience in analytics/data science/insights/strategy/BI
Advanced working knowledge and hands-on experience in SQL
Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in data visualization tools such as Tableau (preferably) 
Expert domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, Python (or R)
Bachelor‚Äôs degree ideally in a business or quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
A good understanding of statistical modelling knowledge or any machine learning technique knowledge (such as hypothesis testing, regression, logistic regression, random forest, etc.)
Good stakeholder management experience. Comfortable presenting to senior leadership and C-suite.
Experience in conducting A/B testing experimentation
Strong experience in finding data insights and provide business recommendation to the business
A hacker‚Äôs mindset ‚Äì the ability to build simple but clever and elegant solutions to new problems within significant resource, operational and time constraints through deep understanding of the business, creative problem solving, and a wide range of expertise in data, analytics, automation, programming, and prototyping.
Excellent communicator with superior written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal communication skills.
Data driven in both decision making and performance measurement.
Extreme comfort in ambiguous, fast-paced environment.
Ability to multi-task, prioritize and coordinate resources.

It‚Äôs Great if you Have: 

MBA or Masters in a quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
Program management certifications (e.g. PMI, PRINCE2) to compliment your program management experience.
Asian market experience.
Travel industry / e-commerce / tech / consulting experience.

About the job
Join TalentPop as a Digital Marketing Assistant (Remote)

TalentPop is a fast-growing e-commerce company committed to connecting with customers and driving traffic to our Shopify store and other marketplaces. We are looking for a creative, data-savvy, and motivated Digital Marketing Assistant to join our team. If you thrive on improving online visibility, crafting engaging content, and supporting key marketing initiatives, we want to hear from you!

What You'll Do

Assist in the creation, editing, and scheduling of email marketing content and newsletters to drive sales and customer engagement.
Support and execute on-page and off-page SEO strategies to increase organic traffic and search rankings.
Use your skills in Excel to collect, analyze, and report on campaign performance data (e.g., email open rates, website traffic, conversion).
Leverage AI tools to streamline content creation processes, research effective messaging, and identify new marketing trends.
Help manage and update website content, banners, and landing pages to support ongoing promotions and product launches.
Monitor competitor marketing activities and assist in the implementation of new digital marketing tactics across various channels.

What We‚Äôre Looking For

Minimum of 1 year of experience supporting digital marketing or content creation efforts, preferably in an e-commerce environment.
A solid understanding of SEO principles, keyword research, and email marketing best practices.
Strong writing and editing skills for crafting clear, compelling, and brand-consistent marketing copy.
Proficiency with **Excel** or Google Sheets for data organization, tracking, and basic analysis.
Highly organized, proactive, and able to manage multiple marketing tasks and deadlines simultaneously.

Technical Requirements

Stable DSL, Cable, or Fiber internet connection (minimum 15 Mbps, LAN connection preferred).
Personal PC or laptop with a minimum i5 processor.

What We Offer

Annual performance-based salary increases.
Health and dental insurance coverage or a health stipend to support your well-being.
Paid Time Off and a Holiday Bonus.
Recognition and performance incentives.
Fast growth means excellent chances for career advancement within the company!

Important: Application Instructions

To be considered for this position, please make sure to include the following application code in your submission: DMA25. This code helps us quickly identify applicants for the Digital Marketing Assistant role. Applications submitted without this code may experience delays in processing. Be sure to highlight it clearly when you apply so our recruitment team knows you‚Äôve carefully read the job posting.

Ready to Join Us?

Become a part of TalentPop and help us drive our e-commerce success to new heights! We're excited to see what you‚Äôll bring to the table.

About the job
Job Description

Berjuang Bersama 4 Tahun terakhir KMNC #berjuang bersama membangun layanan kesehatan Ibu dan Anak yang komprehensif, oleh SDM yang kompeten, berbasis bukti ilmiah, mengedepankan efisiensi berbasis riset kedokteran dan teknologi terkini untuk seluruh lapisan masyarakat Indonesia Untuk menuju ekosistem layanan kesehatan Ibu dan Anak paling peduli (care), nyaman (comfortable), sekaligus terjangkau (affordable) yang pernah ada di Indonesia. Kontribusi KMNC dalam kesehatan Ibu dan Anak tidak berhenti melalui penyediaan layanan kesehatan TERBAIK, namun berkontribusi dalam memberi MANFAAT untuk menurunkan komplikasi kehamilan dan menekan angka kematian Ibu dan Bayi di Indonesia melalui riset kedokteran dan digitalisasi layanan kesehatan. Job Description:

 Manajemen dokter (onboarding, realisasi praktik, handling masukan & komplain dokter)
 Mengelola, melatih, dan mengembangkan tim (tenaga medis, nakes & tim support)
 Melakukan sosialisasi & briefing rutin kepada tim cabang
 Mendokumentasikan kegiatan dalam bentuk laporan harian, mingguan, bulanan & harian

Requirements

 S1 Profesi Dokter
 Diutamakan yang memiliki pengalaman di manajemen operasional, diutamakan di klinik/rumah sakit ibu dan anak

 Mampu bekerja dengan target dan mengelola tim lintas cabang
 Bersedia melakukan perjalanan dinas antar cabang
