About the job
Do you enjoy motivating others to deliver successful solutions for business and customers?

Are you passionate in scientific and engineering methodologies?

Join our growing team

Our Oilfield Services business provides intelligent, connected technologies to monitor and control our energy extraction assets and supporting facilities. Our team arranging technical expertise to meet our client expectation. We provide customers with the peace of mind needed to reliably and efficiently improve their operations.

As a Geothermal Geophysicist, you‚Äôll involve in using physical measurements to understand Earth's heat and potential for renewable energy. This include collecting and analyzing geophysical data, interpreting subsurface heat flow, modelling geothermal reservoirs, conducting field surveys in various conditions, collaborating with engineers and geologists, and reporting findings to support sustainable energy development.

As a Geothermal Geophysicist, you will be responsible for:


Conducting field surveys to collect geophysical data, such as MT resistivity, seismic waves, gravity, and other applied earth physics techniques. 
Processing the collected data to be ready for interpretation, namely 1D, 2D, 3D modeling, and etc.
Interpreting the data and integrate the data with other disciplines, namely geology, geophysics, geochemistry, and reservoir engineering.
Working with geologists, engineers, and other scientists to design experiments and integrate geophysical findings into subsurface characterization, resource delineation, resource estimate, reservoir processes, and others. 
Utilizing advanced software for data processing, interpretation, and 3D subsurface modeling to better understand geothermal reservoirs. 
Preparing detailed reports and presentations on findings and recommendations for stakeholders, contributing to scientific publications. 


Fuel your passion

To be successful in this role you will:


Have bachelor‚Äôs or master‚Äôs degree in Geology, Geophysics, Earth Sciences, Physics, or Geological Engineering.
Have at least 10 years‚Äô experience in Geophysics /Geology experience in a wide variety of reservoir types
Have great foundation in physics, mathematics, and earth sciences. 
Have experience with geophysical instrumentation and data analysis software. 
Have proven ability to interpret seismic data, magnetic fields, and other geophysical measurements. 
Have ability to work in remote locations, handle specialized equipment, and ensure data accuracy. 
Have excellent verbal and written communication to convey complex technical information to diverse audiences. 


Work in a way that works for you

We recognize that everyone is different and that the way in which people want to work and deliver at their best is different for everyone too. In this role, we can offer the following flexible working patterns:


Please discuss your suitable schedule during your discussion with respective recruiter.


Working with us

Our people are at the heart of what we do at Baker Hughes. We know we are better when all our people are developed, engaged and able to bring their whole authentic selves to work. We invest in the health and well-being of our workforce, train and reward talent and develop leaders at all levels to bring out the best in each other.

Working for you

Our inventions have revolutionized energy for over a century. But to keep going forward tomorrow, we know we must push the boundaries today. We prioritize rewarding those who embrace change with a package that reflects how much we value their input. Join us, and you can expect:


Contemporary work-life balance policies and wellbeing activities
Comprehensive private medical care options
Safety net of life insurance and disability programs
Tailored financial programs
Additional elected or voluntary benefits


About Us:

We are an energy technology company that provides solutions to energy and industrial customers worldwide. Built on a century of experience and conducting business in over 120 countries, our innovative technologies and services are taking energy forward ‚Äì making it safer, cleaner and more efficient for people and the planet.

Join Us:

Are you seeking an opportunity to make a real difference in a company that values innovation and progress? Join us and become part of a team of people who will challenge and inspire you! Let‚Äôs come together and take energy forward.

About the job
Role Overview
As a Senior UI/UX Designer, you will play a key role in designing and optimizing Geniebook‚Äôs digital experiences, ensuring that our products are engaging, user-friendly, and aligned with business objectives. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, developers, marketers, and curriculum designers, to enhance the user experience for students, parents, and educators.

Key Responsibilities
Lead the design and development of intuitive and visually compelling user interfaces for Geniebook‚Äôs web and mobile applications.
Conduct user research, usability testing, and data analysis to inform and refine design decisions.
Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity UI designs that effectively communicate design concepts.
Maintain and enhance the design system and UI component libraries to ensure consistency across all digital touchpoints.
Collaborate with developers to ensure seamless implementation of UI/UX designs.
Advocate for user-centric design principles, ensuring accessibility and usability best practices are met.
Stay updated on industry trends, design innovations, and competitive analysis to continuously elevate the product experience.
Work with stakeholders to align business goals with user needs, providing strategic design recommendations.

What You Bring to the Table
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in UI/UX Design, Interaction Design, Graphic Design, or a related field.
6+ years of experience in UI/UX design, preferably in web and mobile application design.
A strong portfolio showcasing a deep understanding of UI/UX design, user research, wireframing, prototyping, and interaction design.
Proficiency in Figma, XD, Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, and other industry-standard design tools.
Experience with design systems and ability to maintain and evolve a structured UI component library.
Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and front-end development constraints (coding knowledge is a plus but not mandatory).
Experience conducting usability testing, heuristic evaluations, and A/B testing to optimize user experiences.
Ability to work in an agile environment with strong time management and prioritization skills.
Excellent communication skills to present design rationale and collaborate effectively with teams across the organization.
Experience in EdTech or education-related platforms is a plus but not required.
Strong English communication skills are required, and please submit your CV in English

Portfolio review will be part of the interview process. A strong online portfolio

(Behance/Dribbble) demonstrating your design approach, problem-solving skills, and attention to detail is required.
Join us at Geniebook and be part of a team that‚Äôs transforming education through innovative design!

job_title: BI Analyst (Supply Analytics, Bangkok-based, Relocation provided)
job_description:
About the job
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,‚ÄØenhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Our Purpose - Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (WITH RELOCATION PROVIDED)

Location: Bangkok, Thailand (*Not open for remote work)

Get to Know our Team:

As part of the Supply Analytics, you will be responsible for identifying new partners and opportunities, cultivating a relationship with them, and working together with them to deliver the best outcome for our end customers. You would also be responsible with managing the day-to-day interaction with the partner and working closely with other teams within Agoda to ensure the partners needs are met.

We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda‚Äôs unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.

The Opportunity: 

As a BI Analyst, you will report directly to either the Senior Manager or Associate Director within the Supply Department and this will be an individual contributor role. You will be responsible and fully empowered to work with the partners on the ground. You will be supported by a team within the Supply department and work closely with other Team members within Agoda.

In this Role, you‚Äôll get to:

Translate internal briefs into analytical projects (to include refining the initial brief and asking the ‚Äòright questions‚Äô, working through potential hypotheses and storyboarding the output)
Use and analyze data from multiple large-scale data warehouses and present statistically strong analysis to a wide range of business stakeholders.
Proactively identify opportunities for growth within supply and the wider business.
Drive new analytical initiatives and projects aimed at improving organizational efficiency and shaping Agoda supply.
Identify, support, and lead projects aimed at scaling up the way the Supply organization leverages on data, insights, and intelligence.
Automate manual operational processes and present back on time savings gained through modernization of business operations

What you‚Äôll Need to Succeed:

At least 2-5+ years of experience working as an Analyst with experience in analytics/data science/insights/strategy/BI
Advanced working knowledge and hands-on experience in SQL
Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in data visualization tools such as Tableau (preferably) 
Expert domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, Python (or R)
Bachelor‚Äôs degree ideally in a business or quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
A good understanding of statistical modelling knowledge or any machine learning technique knowledge (such as hypothesis testing, regression, logistic regression, random forest, etc.)
Good stakeholder management experience. Comfortable presenting to senior leadership and C-suite.
Experience in conducting A/B testing experimentation
Strong experience in finding data insights and provide business recommendation to the business
A hacker‚Äôs mindset ‚Äì the ability to build simple but clever and elegant solutions to new problems within significant resource, operational and time constraints through deep understanding of the business, creative problem solving, and a wide range of expertise in data, analytics, automation, programming, and prototyping.
Excellent communicator with superior written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal communication skills.
Data driven in both decision making and performance measurement.
Extreme comfort in ambiguous, fast-paced environment.
Ability to multi-task, prioritize and coordinate resources.

It‚Äôs Great if you Have: 

MBA or Masters in a quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
Program management certifications (e.g. PMI, PRINCE2) to compliment your program management experience.
Asian market experience.
Travel industry / e-commerce / tech / consulting experience.

job_title: Campaign Management Specialist - Electronics & Automotive (TikTok Shop By Tokopedia) Indonesia
job_description:
About the job
Responsibilities
About the Team
The Campaign Team at TikTok Shop & Tokopedia leads strategic and operational efforts to drive key initiatives across both platforms. We work at the core of platform-wide and category-specific campaigns, collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to grow sellers, engage users, and optimize campaign performance.

We‚Äôre currently expanding our team to support the Electronics & Automotive category one of the most exciting and high-potential verticals. Whether it‚Äôs through day-to-day operations, or data-driven projects, you‚Äôll play an important role in shaping the future of this space. If you're passionate about e-commerce, love solving problems, and enjoy working with both data and people, this is the team for you.

Roles & Responsibilities
As part of the Campaign Team for Electronics & Automotive, your role will focus on end-to-end campaign management, operational excellence, and data-driven execution across both TikTok Shop and Tokopedia. You‚Äôll work closely with category managers, central team, and other internal teams to bring impactful projects to life.

Campaign & Project Management
- Support and/or lead planning and execution of related key campaigns (Mega Campaigns, IP Campaigns, Campaign Project and always-on initiatives).
- Coordinate with cross-functional stakeholders to ensure smooth and timely execution.
- Collaborate with category and central teams to align campaign strategies with business goals.
- Maintain clear documentation, timelines, and reporting for each campaign/project.

Operational Excellence
- Monitor campaign operations and resolve any issues related to execution, product readiness, seller participation, or system flows.
- Work with internal teams (e.g. monetization, IMC, product ops) to optimize processes.
- Ensure all assets, offers, and content are submitted and implemented accurately.

Data & Performance Tracking
- Track and analyze key campaign metrics (e.g. traffic, conversion, GMV, seller performance).
- Prepare regular reports and insights to evaluate campaign effectiveness.
- Identify opportunities for improvement and optimization based on data.
- Support category team with insights to drive growth strategies.

Stakeholder Collaboration
- Act as a bridge between category, marketing, product, creator, and operations teams.
- Communicate updates, blockers, and learnings clearly and proactively.
- Help ensure a consistent and aligned campaign experience for each platforms.

Qualifications
Minimum Qualification(s)
- Minimum 2 years of experience in e-commerce, marketing, operations, or related project roles.
- Comfortable working with data (e.g. Excel, dashboards) and drawing insights.
- Ability to manage timelines, prioritize tasks, and work with multiple stakeholders.
- A self-starter attitude with attention to detail.
- Willingness to adapt in a fast-moving, constantly evolving environment.

Preferred Qualification(s)
- Experience in Electronics and/or Automotive categories.
- Prior exposure to platforms like TikTok Shop, Tokopedia, or similar marketplaces.
- A track record of running campaigns or cross-functional projects.
- A data-first mindset with ability to turn insights into action.
- Enthusiastic about testing, learning, and iterating fast.

About TikTok
TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and we also have offices in New York City, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.


Why Join Us
Inspiring creativity is at the core of TikTok's mission. Our innovative product is built to help people authentically express themselves, discover and connect ‚Äì and our global, diverse teams make that possible. Together, we create value for our communities, inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we work towards every day.
We strive to do great things with great people. We lead with curiosity, humility, and a desire to make impact in a rapidly growing tech company. Every challenge is an opportunity to learn and innovate as one team. We're resilient and embrace challenges as they come. By constantly iterating and fostering an "Always Day 1" mindset, we achieve meaningful breakthroughs for ourselves, our company, and our users. When we create and grow together, the possibilities are limitless. Join us.

Diversity & Inclusion
TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

About the job
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More
This role requires the candidate to work in Jakarta, Indonesia.

Client Overview

Our client is a well-established industrial solutions provider with over two decades of experience supplying high-quality welding, cutting, and automation equipment to Indonesia‚Äôs manufacturing and fabrication sectors. Founded in 2000, the company is known for its strong technical expertise, dependable service, and enduring partnerships with leading global machinery brands.

Serving diverse industries such as automotive, construction, heavy equipment, and energy, the company provides not only equipment but also engineering applications, after-sales support, and technical consulting. With headquarters in Jakarta and an expanding presence in major industrial regions including Surabaya, it remains a trusted partner in driving efficiency, innovation, and productivity within Indonesia‚Äôs industrial landscape.

Job Role

As a leading industrial technology provider specializing in advanced welding solutions and services, with a strong focus on innovation and technical precision, and serving a diverse client base across manufacturing, construction, automotive, and heavy industry sectors, the company is seeking a Technical Sales Representative, to sell laser cutting machinery using a consultative and technically driven approach.

You will identify client needs, deliver demonstrations, and provide full-cycle support from initial contact through post-sales service. This role combines commercial skill with technical know-how, making it ideal for professionals with a passion for industrial automation and customer success.

Key Responsibilities

Identify client requirements and offer tailored technical solutions
Deliver product presentations and machine demonstrations
Prepare commercial proposals and follow up on sales leads
Build and maintain long-term client relationships
Meet or exceed sales targets and KPIs
Provide technical support after sales as needed
Resolve customer technical issues efficiently
Expand the customer network and market reach
Share client feedback with product and technical teams
Act as a liaison between customer needs and internal departments

Candidate Requirements

Education: D3/S1 in Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Mechatronics, or related field.
Experience: At least 2 years hands-on experience with selling industrial machinery, automation, or laser equipment, within the Technical Sales domain.
English Skills: Functional proficiency, especially in technical communication - ability to understand and communicate technical terms, product manuals, and basic email or report writing.
Professional Skills:
Strong communication and client-facing skills.
Ability to explain complex technical products in a consultative manner.
Target-oriented and self-motivated with strong problem-solving abilities.

Sales Analysis, Sales Strategy, Sales and Marketing, B2C Sales, Communication Skills, Sales Management, B2B Sales, Sales Operations

We are seeking a talented and passionate Demi Chef to join our culinary team in Jakarta, Indonesia. As a Demi Chef, you will play a crucial role in maintaining our high standards of food quality and presentation while supporting the Chef de Partie in daily kitchen operations.

Assist the Chef de Partie in food preparation and service for assigned kitchen sections
Prepare and cook menu items according to recipes and presentation standards, ensuring consistency and quality
Maintain proper food handling, storage, and sanitation practices in compliance with HACCP standards
Support mise en place activities and ensure workstations are properly set up before service
Monitor and control food stock and waste to ensure cost efficiency
Verify the freshness, quality, and proper storage of ingredients
Adhere to kitchen safety procedures and maintain cleanliness of work areas and equipment
Communicate effectively with team members and other kitchen sections to ensure smooth operations

Qualifications

1-2 years of experience as a Demi Chef or in a similar culinary role
Culinary degree or diploma from a recognized institution (preferred)

Comprehensive knowledge of kitchen operations, cooking techniques, and food hygiene standards

Positive attitude with a willingness to learn and grow professionally

Flexibility to work various shifts, including weekends and holidays

Physical stamina to stand for extended periods and lift up to 50 pounds
Fluency in English; knowledge of Bahasa Indonesia is a plus

job_title: TikTok Shop - Moderation Quality Assurance Program Manager
job_description:
About the job
Responsibilities
About the Team
Global E-Commerce's Governance and Experience (GNE) is a global team responsible for ensuring a safe and trustworthy marketplace for not only our buyers, but also our sellers and creators. Global Moderation is part of the GNE organization. Our mission is to create the most trustworthy E-commerce platform with a delightful service experience. Global Moderation is looking for a Moderation Quality Assurance Program Manager to build, lean and sharpen our team's operation processes and make recommendations to improve our overall moderation quality. 

To be successful as an Moderation Quality Assurance Program Manager, you should be able to understand complex data sets, identify shortcomings or opportunities, multi-tasking and participate in different projects. Most importantly, you should be able to build and optimise our current operational procedures, using advanced lean process methodology to standardise and improve our QA functions in order to improve overall e-commerce moderation quality. Meanwhile, work very closely with management and/or XFN team to get the project done before deadlines.

Responsibilities
- Overall responsible for building and optimising our current operational procedures, using advanced lean process methodology to improve our QA functions in order to improve overall e-commerce moderation quality.
- Overall responsible for standardizing, leaning and sharpening current workflows (including offline/online QA activities, RCA analysis or other regular QA analytics), producing and documenting all workflows/SOPs and cascading to different QA teams globally.

About the job

Near-Native Proficiency in Tamil

Project Overview

About the job
Are you a coding expert fluent in Bengali eager to shape the future of AI? Large-scale language models are evolving from clever chatbots into powerful engines of scientific discovery. With high-quality training data, tomorrow‚Äôs AI can democratize world-class education, keep pace with cutting-edge research, and streamline software development for engineers everywhere. That training data begins with you‚Äîwe need your expertise to help power the next generation of AI.

We‚Äôre looking for coding specialists who live and breathe algorithms, data structures, software architecture, frontend and backend development, cloud infrastructure, and systems programming‚Äîand who can do so fluently in Bengali. You‚Äôll challenge advanced language models on topics like asynchronous programming, RESTful API integration, memory management, object-oriented design, secure coding practices, and debugging distributed systems‚Äîdocumenting every failure mode so we can harden model reasoning.

On a typical day, you will converse with the model on software engineering tasks and technical scenarios in Bengali, verify logical accuracy and coding fluency, assess naturalness and correctness of Bengali language usage, capture reproducible error traces, and suggest improvements to our prompt engineering and evaluation metrics.

A bachelor‚Äôs, master‚Äôs, or PhD in computer science, software engineering, or a closely related technical field is ideal; real-world coding experience, technical writing in Bengali, or open-source contributions signal fit. Clear, metacognitive communication‚Äî‚Äúshowing your work‚Äù‚Äîis essential.

Ready to turn your coding and Bengali language expertise into the knowledge base for tomorrow‚Äôs AI? Apply today and start teaching the model that will teach the world.

We offer a pay range of $8-to-$65 per hour, with the exact rate determined after evaluating your experience, expertise, and geographic location. As a contractor you‚Äôll supply a secure computer and high-speed internet; company-sponsored benefits such as health insurance and PTO do not apply.

job_title: GoTo Financial - District Sales Manager - Sulawesi (EJBN EI)
job_description:
About the job
About The Role

Ready to take the lead as our District Sales Manager? Join us in EJBN - EI (East Java Bali Nusra - East Indonesia), where you‚Äôll spearhead a dynamic team of sales executives focused on merchant acquisition for our payment acceptance (GoPay) and point-of-sale system (Moka). Leveraging your exceptional team management skills and interpersonal communication, you‚Äôll engage directly with our merchant-partners, gaining insights into their field experiences and challenges. You'll tailor sales strategies to address their needs, streamline their operations, and drive growth. Your leadership will not only expand our merchant-partner network in the region but also ensure your team consistently meets and exceeds regional sales targets on time.

What You Will Do

Lead a dynamic team of 4 Team Leaders to succeed across our 3 key products, which are GMA (Payments acceptance through QRIS), Spiker (IOT enabled payment notifications) and Moka (point of sales system) across the regions of Sulawesi
Ensure the consistent achievement of targets set by the company across different existing product lines as well as exciting upcoming products in the right way, ensuring sales SOPs and quality metrics are met
Lead, coach, and mentor your team, empowering them to refine their acquisition skills and provide tailored solutions that address the specific pain points of our merchant-partners. 
Provide support to team members during negotiations and help address challenging questions from potential customers.
Collaborate closely with the Region Head to plan and implement effective sales strategies which are tailor-made for the region
Utilize various performance management tools to ensure the team consistently meets the input metrics (meetings) as well as output metrics (conversions). 
Able to present complex ideas in a simple way to team members and also problem solve in a structured manner by breaking down a large problem into small solvable parts and solving for each.
Able to utilize data analysis tools like Excel/ Google Sheets/Data Studio to comprehend sales data, analyze it and derive actionable insights for the team from it. Utilize CRM, Google Workspace, and Data Studio to monitor progress and deliver on sales targets.

What You Will Need

7+ years of overall solid sales experience including 3+ years leading a multi-tier sales team (Manager of team managers) consistently achieving targets in assigned roles
Excellent negotiation and communication skills to achieve merchant acquisition & retention targets, and to collaborate with partners and colleagues of all levels
Strong leadership experience to lead, mentor, and grow a high-functioning team
Comfortable working at a fast speed in a dynamic environment and thus ready to work out of the comfort zone frequently, hence prior experience working at a startup or tech company is a plus
Experience and comfort of launching a new market for existing products or launching new products in existing markets 
Knowledge of how to set up a new market, creating areas and sub areas inside a city for better coverage, planning manpower hiring requirements and execution.
Experience of working in a distribution centric role in Prepaid telecom, FMCG & similar industries with working knowledge of Permanent Journey Plans, Route Mapping, Sector wise & beat wise working to ensure basics of leading a disciplined sales force

About The Team

In the Offline Merchants team, we consistently strive to implement solutions that allow our merchant partners in Indonesia (and the greater Southeast Asian region) to sell their products both online and offline. We also work to improve the merchant-partner experience through product innovation and integration with the rest of the Gojek ecosystem.

Our portfolio of products includes merchant-facing solutions that aid our subscribed merchant partners in their sales operations. Southeast Asia is a highly dynamic market, where products have to react promptly to market trends and shifts, and where product managers and business leaders need the flexibility to experiment and iterate fast. With that in mind, as the sales team, we introduce and educate potential customers on how they can benefit by using our products.

One of the biggest obstacles our team has had to overcome is figuring out the most effective way to increase our standing in the market with our Point of Sales solutions. After many weeks of research, collaboration, and trial and error, we figured out that the best way to tackle this issue was to pour a bulk of our effort into acquiring more merchant partners in various industries, leveraging heavily on the Gojek ecosystem as a whole.

We're a highly flexible team with a target-driven mindset. We manage our work hours, so long as we deliver the expected results on time. As a team, we enjoy working with each other, learning from and about one another, and having fun all along the way.

About GoTo Group

GoTo Group is the largest digital ecosystem in Indonesia with its mission to ‚ÄúEmpower Progress‚Äô by offering technological infrastructure and solutions for everyone to access and thrive in the digital economy. The GoTo ecosystem consists of on-demand transportation services, food and grocery delivery, logistics and fulfillment, as well as financial and payment services through the Gojek and GoTo Financial platforms.It is the first platform in Southeast Asia that hosts these crucial cases in a single ecosystem, capturing the majority of Indonesia‚Äôs vast consumer household.

About Gojek

Gojek is Southeast Asia‚Äôs leading on-demand platform and pioneer of the multi-service ecosystem with over 2.5 million driver partners across the regions offering a wide range of services such as transportation, food delivery, logistics and more. With its mission to create impact at scale, Gojek is committed to resolving consumer problems and raising standards of living by connecting consumers to the best providers of goods and services in the market.

About GoTo Financial

GoTo Financial accelerates financial inclusion through its leading financial services and merchants solutions. Its consumer services include GoPay and GoPayLater and serve businesses of all sizes through Midtrans, Moka, GoBiz Plus, GoBiz, and Selly. With its trusted and inclusive ecosystem of products, GoTo Financial is open to new growth opportunities and aims to empower everyone to Make It Happen, Make It Together, Make It Last.

GoTo and its business units, including Gojek and GoToFinancial ("GoTo") only post job opportunities on our official channels on our respective company websites and on LinkedIn. GoTo is not liable for any job postings or job offers that did not originate from us. You should conduct your own due diligence to prevent being victims of any fake job scams, if they did not originate from GoTo's official recruitment channels.

About the job
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More
This role requires the candidate to work in Semarang, Indonesia.

Client Overview

Our client is a global leader in materials science and innovative self-adhesive solutions for consumer products and labels, with a focus on apparel, footwear, and retail industries. Established in 1935, the company pioneered pressure-sensitive stickers and has since expanded to operate in over 50 countries across six continents, delivering creative and sustainable solutions including graphic tickets, tags, labels, embellishments, and packaging solutions.

In Indonesia, the company serves a wide range of customers in apparel, footwear, home textiles, and sports goods sectors. Its manufacturing sites act as strategic hubs to support exporters across the country, ensuring high-quality products and efficient production to meet both domestic and international demand.

Job Role

The Production Manager will lead daily production operations while ensuring operational excellence, people development, and continuous improvement in a fast-paced, multinational manufacturing environment. Reporting to the Head of Operations, this role is responsible for driving productivity, efficiency, and safety across the production floor.

This position involves managing multi-shift teams, allocating resources effectively, and collaborating with cross-functional stakeholders to achieve production, cost, quality, and compliance targets. Success requires strong technical expertise combined with the ability to lead, influence, and align teams with organizational goals.

Key Responsibilities

Build, develop, and lead a high-performing production team, fostering accountability, collaboration, and continuous improvement.
Ensure operational excellence across multi-shift production: safety, quality, on-time delivery, and cost-effectiveness.
Set performance KPIs, monitor progress, and optimize workflow with planning, quality, and supply chain teams.
Drive process improvements using Lean Manufacturing, Six Sigma, and efficiency frameworks; implement automation and standardization to improve productivity and reduce waste.
Oversee preventive and corrective maintenance programs for production machinery.
Enforce health, safety, and compliance standards across all production activities.
Provide strategic reporting and operational analysis to senior management for longterm planning and improvements.

Candidate Requirements

Education: Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in Mechanical, Industrial, or related Engineering fields.
Experience: 7‚Äì10 years in manufacturing, including at least 5 years in production leadership roles in multinational or complex manufacturing environments.
Industry Knowledge: Familiarity with labels, packaging, adhesives, garment, or apparel manufacturing.
Technical Skills: Lean Manufacturing, Continuous Flow, TPM, OEE, Six Sigma, and continuous improvement frameworks; ability to link operational performance to financial outcomes.
Leadership & Management: Proven ability to lead large-scale production teams, drive cultural change, and influence both shop-floor operators and senior management.
Operational Excellence: Demonstrated success in delivering OEE, yield, lead time, cost efficiency, and strategic improvements like lean transformation, automation, and capability building.
Languages: Professional proficiency in English for communication with regional/global teams and leadership.
Personal Qualities: Strategic mindset with hands-on leadership, strong interpersonal, organizational, and project management skills; proactive, resilient, and results-oriented.

About the job
About The Role

We're looking for a talented UX Writer to join our team!

As a UX Writer, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the user experience across our products. Information Architecture: Partner with designers and product managers to map out user flows and information architecture, ensuring content is structured logically and intuitively.

Qualifications

About the job
To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.

Job Category

Sales

Job Details

About Salesforce

We‚Äôre Salesforce, the Customer Company, inspiring the future of business with AI+ Data +CRM. Leading with our core values, we help companies across every industry blaze new trails and connect with customers in a whole new way. And, we empower you to be a Trailblazer, too ‚Äî driving your performance and career growth, charting new paths, and improving the state of the world. If you believe in business as the greatest platform for change and in companies doing well and doing good ‚Äì you‚Äôve come to the right place.

Kami mencari Account Executive Bisnis Kecil yang memiliki motivasi tinggi dan berorientasi pada hasil untuk bergabung dengan tim penjualan kami yang dinamis. Peran ini akan sangat penting dalam mendorong pertumbuhan dengan mengakuisisi akun logo baru dan memperluas jejak kami di segmen Bisnis Kecil (SB) (1-15 karyawan). Aspek utama dari peran ini adalah melibatkan eksekutif tingkat C dan pemilik bisnis, memahami tujuan strategis mereka, dan mengartikulasikan nilai bisnis dari rangkaian solusi Salesforce. Kandidat yang ideal adalah komunikator yang kuat, mahir dalam membangun hubungan baik melalui telepon, dan memiliki pendekatan penjualan yang konsultatif.

Tanggung Jawab

Prospek yang ditargetkan: Secara proaktif mengidentifikasi dan memprospek peluang logo baru di pasar SB melalui berbagai aktivitas outbound (panggilan telepon, kampanye email, penjualan sosial, dll.).
Keterlibatan C-Level: Berinteraksi dengan para eksekutif tingkat C dan pemilik bisnis untuk memahami prioritas bisnis, tantangan, dan tujuan strategis mereka.
Penjualan Berbasis Nilai: Mengartikulasikan nilai bisnis dan ROI dari rangkaian solusi Salesforce untuk memenuhi kebutuhan dan masalah pelanggan yang spesifik.
Mengembangkan Sudut Pandang Pelanggan: Mengembangkan Sudut Pandang (POV) yang jelas dan menarik bagi setiap pelanggan, yang menunjukkan pemahaman tentang bisnis mereka dan bagaimana Salesforce dapat mendorong hasil yang positif.
Analisis Kebutuhan: Mengungkap tantangan dan peluang bisnis secara efektif melalui pertanyaan yang mendalam dan mendengarkan secara aktif.
Demonstrasi Tingkat Tinggi: Melakukan demo tingkat tinggi yang menarik dan disesuaikan dengan platform Salesforce, dengan fokus pada proposisi nilai yang relevan dengan bisnis pelanggan.
Manajemen Pipeline: Menjaga pipeline penjualan yang kuat, meramalkan aktivitas penjualan secara akurat, dan mencapai atau melampaui target penjualan yang ditetapkan.
Pertumbuhan Akun: Mengidentifikasi dan mengejar peluang untuk mengembangkan akun yang sudah ada di segmen SB dengan memperkenalkan solusi Salesforce tambahan.
Kolaborasi: Bekerja sama dengan tim internal (misalnya, Manajemen Penjualan, Pemasaran, Insinyur Solusi) untuk memastikan pengalaman pelanggan yang mulus.
Kemahiran CRM: Memanfaatkan CRM Salesforce secara efektif untuk mengelola prospek, melacak aktivitas, dan memelihara informasi pelanggan yang akurat.
Pembelajaran Berkelanjutan: Tetap up-to-date dengan pembaruan produk Salesforce terbaru, tren industri, dan lanskap kompetitif.

Kualifikasi

1-2 tahun pengalaman penjualan
Rekam jejak keberhasilan yang terbukti dalam peran telesales atau penjualan internal, lebih disukai yang menjual solusi SaaS.
Pengalaman menjual kepada eksekutif tingkat C dan pemilik bisnis.
Menunjukkan kemampuan untuk memprospek dan memperoleh akun logo baru.
Pemahaman yang kuat tentang pasar Usaha Kecil (SB) dan kebutuhannya yang unik.
Keterampilan komunikasi, presentasi, dan interpersonal yang sangat baik, dengan kemampuan untuk membangun hubungan baik dengan cepat melalui telepon.
Kemampuan untuk mengartikulasikan konsep teknis yang kompleks dan proposisi nilai bisnis dengan jelas dan ringkas.
Ketajaman bisnis yang kuat dan kemampuan untuk memahami dan mendiskusikan tantangan bisnis.
Pengalaman melakukan demonstrasi perangkat lunak tingkat tinggi.
Memiliki motivasi diri, berorientasi pada hasil, dan mampu bekerja secara mandiri.
Memiliki kemampuan organisasi dan manajemen waktu yang kuat.
Kemahiran dalam menggunakan sistem CRM, lebih disukai Salesforce.

We are seeking a highly motivated and results-oriented Small business account executive to join our dynamic sales team. This role will be pivotal in driving growth by acquiring new logo accounts and expanding our footprint within the Small Business (SB) segment (1-15 employees). A key aspect of this role involves engaging with C-level executives and business owners, understanding their strategic objectives, and articulating the business value of the Salesforce suite of solutions. The ideal candidate will be a strong communicator, adept at building rapport over the phone, and possess a consultative sales approach.

Responsibilities

Targeted Prospecting: Proactively identify and prospect new logo opportunities within the SB market through various outbound activities (cold calling, email campaigns, social selling, etc.).
C-Level Engagement: Engage with C-level executives and business owners to understand their business priorities, challenges, and strategic goals.
Value-Based Selling: Articulate the business value and ROI of the Salesforce suite of solutions to address specific customer needs and pain points.
Developing Customer POV: Develop a clear and compelling Point of View (POV) for each customer, demonstrating an understanding of their business and how Salesforce can drive positive outcomes.
Needs Analysis: Effectively uncover business challenges and opportunities through insightful questioning and active listening.
High-Level Demonstrations: Conduct engaging and tailored high-level demos of the Salesforce platform, focusing on the value proposition relevant to the customer's business.
Pipeline Management: Maintain a robust sales pipeline, accurately forecasting sales activities and achieving or exceeding assigned sales targets.
Account Growth: Identify and pursue opportunities to grow existing accounts within the SB segment by introducing additional Salesforce solutions.
Collaboration: Work closely with internal teams (e.g., Sales Management, Marketing, Solution Engineers) to ensure a seamless customer experience.
CRM Proficiency: Utilize Salesforce CRM effectively to manage leads, track activities, and maintain accurate customer information.
Continuous Learning: Stay up-to-date on the latest Salesforce product updates, industry trends, and competitive landscape.

Qualifications

1-2 years of sales experience
Proven track record of success in a telesales or inside sales role, preferably selling SaaS solutions.
Experience selling to C-level executives and business owners.
Demonstrated ability to prospect and acquire new logo accounts.
Strong understanding of the Small Business (SB) market and its unique needs.
Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport quickly over the phone.
Ability to articulate complex technical concepts and business value propositions clearly and concisely.
Strong business acumen and the ability to understand and discuss business challenges.
Experience conducting high-level software demonstrations.
Self-motivated, results-oriented, and able to work independently.
Strong organizational and time management skills.
Proficiency in using CRM systems, preferably Salesforce.

About the job

The Opportunity 
Reporting to Program Director of Plan Indonesia, the Regional Project Manager will be responsible for designing, planning and overseeing the management of projects, providing leadership and advisory to County Project Team members from 8 Plan International Offices and 3 project partners, CLT of Plan Indonesia, APAC Regional Hub.
The Regional Project Manager will play a critical role in ensuring effective project management of an anticipated project funded by Google, across 11 countries in the Asia region, on the mental wellness of young people in the digital space. S/he is accountable for overseeing the planning, implementation, monitoring, and evaluation of all project activities within the region, ensuring alignment with organizational goals and donor requirements. The position‚Äôs purpose is to provide strategic direction, harmonize operational standards, and facilitate coordination among country teams and the Plan International APAC Hub to optimize efficiency and impact.

S/he is responsible for providing leadership to the project management team across 11 countries, liaising with the Country Leadership Team (CLT) of Plan Indonesia. The position is accountable for identifying and mitigating risks, resolving operational challenges, and facilitating communication among internal and external stakeholders to strengthen collaboration and knowledge sharing. Additionally, the S/he supports capacity building within country offices, provides guidance on compliance and reporting, and ensures that the project delivers measurable impact while maintaining high-quality performance. By bridging regional strategy with local implementation, S/he plays a pivotal role in maximizing the project‚Äôs overall effectiveness and sustainability across all participating countries.

Key Responsibility :

Program planning, design, and development: design and plan projects within the thematic area, liaise with the Program Development Unit and Fundraising Department for resource mobilization; of Plan Indonesia and APAC regional hub, and align the project design and implementation with Plan International principles of safeguarding and gender transformative.
Oversight of project management: ensuring effective project management by providing oversight and supervision to country project management team to maintain the delivery of appropriate technical, operational, and financial outputs (spending and delivery), overall monitoring of the progress of project implementation under the program as per the country priority and the global thematic; ensuring effective measure to comply with Plan International and donor policies and guidelines.
Advocacy and influencing: lead the advocacy and influencing at Asia region and country‚Äôs agenda on the thematic area of expertise to inform policies, and enrich regional INGO/CSO discussions and public opinion contributing to the effort to build Plan Indonesia‚Äôs thought leadership in child rights and girls‚Äô equality at the region.
Reporting and knowledge management: ensuring the quality of comprehensive and compiled project reports, evaluation, and monitoring; participating and contributing to the reporting process at the country level and regional as an effort to document lessons learned, and knowledge products for information sharing and advocacy, both at country and regional level.
Partnership and people management: maintaining effective working relationships with partners, Plan International Offices, Regional hub, and the Global Hub as well maintaining good teamwork for an efficient team.


Requirements for The Role:
Essential
Master degree or higher majoring in mental wellness, gender development study, human rights, global health, strategic management, international relations, or social sciences related majors
+10 years of proven national-level program or +5 years of proven regional-level program management in INGOs, UN and multi-country agencies
Experience managing multi-country initiatives, providing remote leadership, ensuring accountability, harmonizing implementation approaches, and leading cross-border coordination. Ability to identify synergies and scale innovations across countries.
Proven ability to engage, manage, and influence institutions donors, UN agencies, INGOs, regional platforms, philanthropic entities, and private sector partners at regional level
Diplomatic and good communication strategy and negotiation abilities with regional intergovernmental bodies, donors, networks and other regional audiences
Ability to lead multi-country teams, providing strategic oversight while empowering national teams
Facilitation and convening skills to unite diverse stakeholders, including youth leaders, governments, private sector, and civil society
Understanding of gender transformative programming, intersectionality, disability inclusion, and international frameworks such as CEDAW and UN Youth Strategy

Desirable
Master degree majoring in mental wellness, gender development study, human rights, global health, strategic management, international relations, or social sciences related majors
Ability to manage relationships with multi-lateral and bilateral donors, meet compliance standards, lead donor reporting, and co-create new funding opportunities.
Conflict resolution, intercultural communication, and team motivation skills. Skills to navigate complex political environments, manage sensitivities, and build alliances
Strong awareness of team dynamics, empathy, and ability to inspire trust across diverse stakeholders
Ability to represent the project in regional media, conferences, and thought leadership platforms. Skilled in visibility strategies and messaging tailored for diverse audiences.
Skills for capacity-building and nurturing youth leadership
Change management skills to navigate evolving donor priorities or geopolitical shifts
Ability to identify operational, political, reputational, and financial risks and develop mitigation strategies.
In-depth understanding of ASEAN/SAARC or other relevant regional bodies, their governance frameworks, youth development mandates, and policy mechanisms. Ability to align project objectives with regional agendas.

About the job
About the Role
We are looking for a detail-oriented and proactive Tax Specialist to join our team. This role is responsible for managing end-to-end tax compliance, from preparing and filing monthly tax obligations to supporting audits and ensuring adherence to the latest Indonesian tax regulations. The ideal candidate thrives in a fast-paced environment, demonstrates strong integrity, and is committed to accuracy and compliance while continuously seeking process improvements.

Job Description
Prepare, calculate, and submit monthly tax obligations (PPh 21, PPh 23/26, PPh 4(2), PPh Badan, PPN).
Ensure timely e-filing and e-bupot submission through DJP Online.
Input and validate tax invoices (Faktur Pajak Masukan & Keluaran).
Reconcile tax reports with General Ledger and supporting documents.
Maintain accurate and up-to-date tax records for audit purposes.
Handle tax payments and monitor tax deposit deadlines.
Liaise with internal teams (procurement, HR, legal) to collect complete and accurate data.
Support external and internal tax audit processes (preparation and clarification).
Assist in updating internal tax SOPs and provide suggestions for process improvements.
Stay up to date with the latest Indonesian tax regulations and policies.
Manage import transactions and ensure compliance with related documentation.
Use Coretax and other relevant tax systems effectively.

Key Requirements
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Accounting, Fiscal Administration, or Finance.
Minimum 2 years of hands-on experience in operational tax handling (PPN, PPh) in FMCG Industry.
Strong knowledge of Indonesian tax regulations (UU HPP, PMK, Perdirjen).
Proficient in e-faktur, e-bupot, e-filing, and DJP Online.
Experience with tax software or accounting systems (e.g., Odoo, Jurnal).
Strong Microsoft Excel skills for reconciliation and data tabulation.
High attention to detail, accuracy, and ability to meet strict deadlines.
Strong integrity and commitment to compliance.
Able to work independently with minimal supervision.

About the job
At Roche you can show up as yourself, embraced for the unique qualities you bring. Our culture encourages personal expression, open dialogue, and genuine connections, where you are valued, accepted and respected for who you are, allowing you to thrive both personally and professionally. This is how we aim to prevent, stop and cure diseases and ensure everyone has access to healthcare today and for generations to come. Join Roche, where every voice matters.

The Position

As a Business Application professional, you will play a key role in ensuring excellent service and support for Roche instruments and solutions. You will serve as a trusted technical partner to our customers, ensuring smooth operations, quality performance, and reliable results that empower better patient outcomes.

The Opportunity

In this role, you will be responsible for providing high-quality service and application support across Roche instruments and reagents. You will manage technical issues, perform troubleshooting, and ensure timely resolution through proactive follow-up and effective case management.

You will:

Deliver service and support for Roche instruments and perform routine quality performance monitoring
Manage troubleshooting for instruments and reagents via phone or onsite visits, ensuring prompt and effective solutions
Lead daily operational tasks including reagent issue handling, software upgrades, and customer visits based on priority
Conduct operation and application training for new instrument placements and refresh sessions for customers and partners
Maintain accurate records in Roche‚Äôs Case Management System, ensuring traceability and timely case closure
Identify business opportunities, share market insights, and support initiatives to enhance customer satisfaction and growth
Handle customer inquiries and complaints professionally, in compliance with Roche standards and SOPs

This position requires a customer-centric mindset, technical expertise, and strong collaboration with cross-functional teams to ensure that Roche continues to deliver impactful healthcare solutions efficiently and effectively.

Who you are

You have a strong scientific or technical background combined with a passion for supporting healthcare innovation. You thrive in a dynamic environment and are driven to deliver excellence to customers.

Qualifications
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Life Sciences, Health Analysis, Molecular Biology, Medical, Tissue Diagnostics, or a related field
Minimum of two years‚Äô experience in the diagnostics industry, preferably in Pathology Anatomy Lab business
Strong understanding of Pathology Anatomy Lab workflow, including automated IHC/ISH staining and Digital Pathology Solutions
Demonstrated leadership, project management, and problem-solving abilities
Able to work independently, deliver results under pressure, and travel extensively with flexible hours (including weekends if required)
Excellent communication skills in English, with proficient computer literacy and technical documentation capability

Who we are

A healthier future drives us to innovate. Together, more than 100‚Äô000 employees across the globe are dedicated to advance science, ensuring everyone has access to healthcare today and for generations to come. Our efforts result in more than 26 million people treated with our medicines and over 30 billion tests conducted using our Diagnostics products. We empower each other to explore new possibilities, foster creativity, and keep our ambitions high, so we can deliver life-changing healthcare solutions that make a global impact.

Let‚Äôs build a healthier future, together.

Roche is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

About the job
Title

Mechanical Materials Engineer

KBR‚Äôs Sustainable Technology Solutions (STS) group is looking for a Mechanical Materials Engineer to support the Abadi LNG project, one of the largest projects in Asia. This project will provide front-end design (FEED) for onshore liquefied natural gas facilities & will have a peak production capacity targets of 9.5 million tons per annum of LNG and 150 million standard cubic feet per day of pipeline gas. The Abadi LNG project has been designated a project of national strategic importance by the Indonesian government.

The Mechanical Materials Engineer will lead the material selection study, develop suitable corrosion control strategy and implement corrosion monitoring philosophy for the Abadi Project. This role will develop and update Engineering guidelines, specifications and best practices within Metallurgy, Welding, Coatings and Corrosion Control for the project.

Responsibilities

Conduct Erosion / Corrosion modeling /prediction / Assessment studies using latest software program for services in Oil and Gas industry
Study and develop Material Selection Philosophy (MSP), Material Selection Diagram (MSD) and Material Selection Report (MSR) during Concept, Pre-Feed, FEED and Detail Engineering phases of the Project
Review related detailed design specifications and drawings, submitted by Contractors and Consulting Engineers for compliance with Design Basis, Specifications, Codes, Standards and Industry Practices
Review and endorse Consultant/Contractor's design and coordinate the material and corrosion design review, evaluate options and select best techno-economic solutions
Provide technical support related to material and corrosion to the Project during Concept, Pre FEED, FEED, detailed engineering, procurement, fabrication, testing, installation commissioning and start-up stages of the project
Advise corrosion monitoring product specification, material selection, identifying monitoring locations, selection criteria for the periodic inspection of facilities covering both Offshore assets in upstream, midstream & downstream Oil & Gas, LNG, refinery and petrochemical facilities

Required Qualifications

Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Materials Science, Metallurgical / Mechanical engineering or related field
Minimum of 7 years of years relevant experience in Materials and corrosion Engineering in Oil & Gas Industry with a premier Engineering Consultant or Oil & Gas Company
Working knowledge with international design codes, standards and Company standards and procedure and design software packages such as Predict, ECE5, Hydrocor, and Norsok M506 etc
Highly proficient with relevant industry standards (API, NACE, ISO, NORSOK, DNV, ASME, ASTM, etc.) as well as design and fabrication requirements for Oil and Gas projects
Proven ability with material selection, evaluating corrosion control strategies and implementing corrosion monitoring techniques covering both Offshore assets in upstream, midstream & downstream Oil & Gas, Refinery and Petro chemical facilities
Fully familiar with corrosion problems associated with projects for tubing & X-Mas trees, pipelines, valves, piping, vessels & exchangers and rotating equipment in Oil and Gas industry
Experienced in coordinating with expert Contractor/Vendor representatives during contractor selection, drawings review and start-up phases
Strong technical, planning, communication, presentation and reporting skills

About the job
Job Description

For more than 130 years, our company has brought hope to humanity through the development of important medicines and vaccines and today, we are at the forefront of research to deliver innovative health solutions that advance the prevention and treatment of diseases in people and animals.

In Indonesia, our company has been established since 2005 and currently focuses on two main therapeutic areas, namely oncology and vaccines.

Job Summary

The position will support the strategic and operational marketing of HPV Vaccine in the Healthcare Professional (HCP) channel, driving awareness, recommendation, and vaccination uptake across Indonesia.

This role is ideal for a dynamic and data-driven marketer passionate about healthcare and eager to bridge science with marketing excellence.

Responsibilities

Strategy & Planning

Collaborate cross-functionally with Sales, Medical, and Commercial Excellence teams to ensure integrated planning and flawless implementation.

HCP Engagement & Campaign Execution

Work closely with the sales team to drive recommendation and conversion at the account level through targeted initiatives.

Content & Material Management

Ensure all promotional and educational materials are aligned with global/regional direction and adapted for local needs.
Manage content localization and translation processes to support timely deployment.

Performance Tracking & Analysis

Monitor leading and lagging indicators (awareness, recommendation rate, sales performance, MCCP coverage, event reach, etc.).
Analyze HCP feedback and event outcomes to refine tactics and improve ROI.
Support business reporting and dashboard tracking to guide future planning.

Collaboration & Innovation

Work closely with regional and global teams to leverage campaign assets while adapting to local needs.
Bring new ideas to strengthen disease awareness, medical education, and engagement across digital and on-ground platforms.
Support the ongoing transformation of HPV marketing into data-driven, insight-based, and digitally enabled operations.

Requirements

Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in Pharmacy, Life Sciences, or Marketing/Business; a Master‚Äôs Degree is a plus.
Minimum 1‚Äì2 years of marketing or product management experience in healthcare or the pharmaceutical industry.
Strong project-management and analytical skills, with attention to detail.
Comfortable working in cross-functional, fast-paced, and matrix environments.
Excellent communication skills in English.
Digitally savvy; proficiency in using digital tools is a strong plus.

Act with Urgency 
Experimentation, Learn & Adapt 
Embrace Diversity & Inclusion 
Speak Up & be open-minded 

 

OUR VALUES

Patient First

Respect for People 
Innovation & Scientific Excellence

Brand Management, Brand Management, Business Reporting, Business Reviews, Communication, Creative Campaign Development, Dashboard Reporting, Data Analysis, Dermatology, Digital Marketing, Engagement Strategies, Global Team Collaboration, Healthcare Marketing, Interpersonal Relationships, Key Performance Indicators (KPI), Market Analysis, Marketing, Marketing Planning, Marketing Strategy Implementation, Market Research, Medical Teaching, Performance Tracking, Product Development, Product Management, Product Marketing {+ 5 more}

 Responsible for the promotion of the hotel, its image, facilities and services to the general public, customers, the hotel and the community.

About the job
Indonesia

Capacity Development and Training Specialist

Organization

DT Global

Posted 5 Nov 2025 Closing date 19 Nov 2025

Location: Remote

Program Background

Responsibilities

The SKALA Program is a significant Australian investment designed to help Indonesia address regional disparities in development. SKALA will contribute to this objective by strengthening selected elements of Indonesia‚Äôs large and complex decentralised government system responsible for the delivery of basic services (Layanan Dasar). The SKALA Program‚Äôs core approach is to facilitate better collaboration (Kolaborasi) between Indonesian government stakeholders, at national and subnational levels, to help realise synergies (Sinergi) that will trigger improved service delivery. Moreover, SKALA will build on, and take to scale, the successes and learning from Australia‚Äôs previous 19 years of support to Indonesia‚Äôs decentralised government system. The SKALA Program is to be implemented through the following three pillars:

Pillar 1: Stronger national level enabling environment for sub-national service delivery.
Pillar 2: Better sub-national governance for service delivery.
Pillar 3: Greater participation, representation and influence for women, people with disabilities and vulnerable groups.

SKALA is implemented at the national level with an office in Jakarta and at the subnational level with offices in Aceh, Nusa Tenggara Barat, Nusa Tenggara Timur, Maluku, Gorontalo, Kalimantan Utara, Tanah Papua. In addition to the 3 pillars, SKALA works across 4 general themes of Public Financial Management, Minimum Service Standards, Data and Analysis and GEDSI.

About DT Global Asia Pacific

At DT Global Asia Pacific, we aim to positively impact people‚Äôs lives through delivery excellence. As a leading implementing partner across Asia and the Pacific, we co-create locally led solutions in partnership with governments, communities, and stakeholders. We bring together talented teams and deep regional expertise to deliver initiatives that promote inclusive economic growth, essential services, and resilient, secure communities. With over 1,500 staff, experts in 22+ countries and more than 60 years of development experience, we tackle complex community, national and transnational challenges ‚Äî from governance and justice systems to climate resilience, infrastructure and social equity ‚Äî with innovative thinking and a commitment to long-term impact.

For more information, please see www.dt-global.com

The Role

Capacity Development and Training Specialist will assist SKALA and its government counterparts, especially the MoHA-Pusdatin (Ministry of Home Affairs, Center of Data and Information), in enhancing and scaling the One Data Policy, Planning Budgeting System (SIPD ‚Äì Sistem Informasi Pemerintahan Daerah), and its implementation at the sub-national level. The Consultant will assist SKALA to support MoHA Pusdatin to design capacity-building on the use of SIPD, develop curriculum and training modules, and conduct training-for-trainers for related stakeholders at SKALA supported provinces.

The consultant will provide technical advice and skills to conduct a capacity-building needs assessment, facilitate capacity-building design and development of curricula and training modules, and train the SKALA supported provinces‚Äô trainers. The Consultant will work with other technical Data and Analytics teams to ensure coherence, provide support, and provide input to ministries' counterparts.

Click on the link or copy paste it to access the full Terms of Reference for this position:

https://tinyurl.com/5n8mb3mv

About You

Specific Responsibilities

 Assessment of the capacity of local/sub-national government in the implementation of One Data, use of the SIPD system and its connection to the data and analysis system, i.e. SEPAKAT, SIKD.
Development of capacity building design in consultation with MoHA and SKALA supported province governments.
Develop training curricula and modules for Regional One Data implementation and use of SIPD
Support the development of e-tutorial for SIPD utilization.
Facilitate training of trainers (ToT) for One Data Implementation in SKALA-supported provinces.
Supporting SKALA‚Äôs sub-national team assisting local governments (provinces and oversight to districts/cities) on SIPD and one data implementation.
Supporting the sub-national team to assist provincial governments in Tanah Papua on the enhancement of One Data implementation, including in the development and or review of local regulations, action plan, priority data, etc.
Facilitating MoHA-Pusdatin collaboration with other ministries related to development of executive dashboard for 12 Presidential Priority programs monitoring.
Support the knowledge sharing on one data implementation.
Perform other tasks required in coordination with supervisor.

Other Duties

Comply with DFAT, DT Global and SKALA policies on gender, disability, fraud and anticorruption, child protection, PSEAH and the environment.
Ensure compliance and adherence to various operational policies, guidelines and manuals issued by DT Global and SKALA.

Job Requirements

Work environment involves only infrequent exposure to disagreeable elements and minor physical exertion and/or strain.

Persetujuan Pelamar

SRI tidak memungut biaya apapun selama proses rekrutmen.
Informasi dan data yang pelamar berikan selama proses rekrutmen SRI adalah benar dan sesungguhnya. Jika ditemukan adanya informasi dan data yang tidak valid, maka SRI dapat menghentikan proses rekrutmen pelamar.
Data pribadi pelamar hanya akan digunakan untuk kepentingan proses rekrutmen. SRI tidak akan membagikan informasi pribadi pelamar kepada individu atau organisasi lain tanpa seizin pelamar, kecuali jika dibutuhkan secara hukum.
Pelamar menyetujui memberikan data sesuai yang di minta oleh SRI
Pelamar menyetujui data yang diberikan untuk digunakan oleh SRI selama proses rekrutmen.

About the job
Who We Are:

Metropolitan Group has been delivering outstanding real estate services across the UAE since 2008. Our flagship agency, Metropolitan Premium Properties, is one of the most awarded in Dubai and is consistently recognised by top developers like Emaar, DAMAC, Meraas, and more.

We‚Äôve built a people-first culture ‚Äì one that focuses on nurturing talent, supporting growth, and creating an environment where people thrive. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôve been recognised as a Great Place to Work and ranked among the UAE‚Äôs Top 10 Best Workplaces.

What You Will Do

We‚Äôre looking for a hands-on Social Media Specialist who can blend creative direction, storytelling, and data-driven thinking to elevate our brand presence across key channels. You will manage up to four accounts across Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube, and Telegram, shaping content that is visually consistent, strategic, and performance-oriented.

Content Strategy & Planning: Develop and execute channel-specific social media plans aligned with business and campaign goals.
Account Management: Manage multiple accounts in English and Russian, maintaining consistent tone of voice and narrative identity.
Content Creation: Design and produce visuals, banners, short-form videos, and post copy using tools such as Canva, Figma, and Adobe Suite.
Campaign Execution: Launch lead-generating SMM campaigns and monitor performance across platforms, adjusting strategies based on results.
Production Coordination: Create concepts for photo/video shoots and coordinate freelancers/contractors involved in production.
Trend & Platform Research: Stay updated on algorithm changes, social formats, and emerging best practices to keep content relevant.
Community Management: Moderate comments and direct messages, ensuring timely and professional engagement.
Performance Reporting: Track key metrics, prepare reports, and present actionable insights to internal stakeholders.

Who We Are Looking For
You are a proactive creator who understands both the visual power of content and the business impact of performance marketing. You work with speed, clarity, and ownership.
Experience: 2+ years managing brand social media accounts.
 Portfolio: Must provide examples/links that show real results.
 Language: Fluent English (C1+). Russian is a plus.
 Skills: Confident with Canva/Figma/Adobe and short-form video editing.
 Platforms: Strong understanding of IG, LinkedIn, YouTube, and Telegram.
 Reporting: Able to analyse performance and present clear conclusions.
 Availability: Work fully on UAE business hours.
 Commitment: Full-time only ‚Äî no side projects or freelance clients.
 Mindset: Positive, adaptable, and comfortable with last-minute changes and shifting priorities.
 Ownership: Capable of running content workflows independently from idea to execution.

Why Metropolitan?

A leading real estate company in the UAE, with 15+ years of experience and 8 offices across 4 cities.
Certified Great Place to Work, ranked in the UAE‚Äôs Top 10 Workplaces for 4 consecutive years.
Diverse and inclusive environment with 1000+ employees, 65+ nationalities and 40+ languages.
Career growth and internal mobility are actively supported, proven by countless success stories.
Everything is provided to help you work efficiently and comfortably, from specialist equipment and training to break areas and Friday treats.
A people-first culture that recognises success, acts on feedback, rewards loyalty, and actively drives positive change.
Company-wide referral programs across 10+ services, with generous rewards for successful referrals.

Ready to Apply?

If this role feels like the right fit for your next career move, please submit your CV in English. Here‚Äôs what to expect from the hiring process:
Recruiter Interview: A casual conversation to get to know you better.
Hiring Manager Interview: A focused discussion with your potential line manager about the role and expectations.
Challenge: For final candidates, a short task to help us both assess the fit.
C-Level Interview: A final conversation with the relevant leader, if not already involved.

We look forward to meeting driven, creative people ready to be part of Metropolitan‚Äôs next chapter.

job_title: BI Analyst (Supply Analytics, Bangkok-based, Relocation provided)
job_description:
About the job
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,‚ÄØenhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Our Purpose - Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (WITH RELOCATION PROVIDED)

Location: Bangkok, Thailand (*Not open for remote work)

Get to Know our Team:

As part of the Supply Analytics, you will be responsible for identifying new partners and opportunities, cultivating a relationship with them, and working together with them to deliver the best outcome for our end customers. You would also be responsible with managing the day-to-day interaction with the partner and working closely with other teams within Agoda to ensure the partners needs are met.

We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda‚Äôs unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.

The Opportunity: 

As a BI Analyst, you will report directly to either the Senior Manager or Associate Director within the Supply Department and this will be an individual contributor role. You will be responsible and fully empowered to work with the partners on the ground. You will be supported by a team within the Supply department and work closely with other Team members within Agoda.

In this Role, you‚Äôll get to:

Translate internal briefs into analytical projects (to include refining the initial brief and asking the ‚Äòright questions‚Äô, working through potential hypotheses and storyboarding the output)
Use and analyze data from multiple large-scale data warehouses and present statistically strong analysis to a wide range of business stakeholders.
Proactively identify opportunities for growth within supply and the wider business.
Drive new analytical initiatives and projects aimed at improving organizational efficiency and shaping Agoda supply.
Identify, support, and lead projects aimed at scaling up the way the Supply organization leverages on data, insights, and intelligence.
Automate manual operational processes and present back on time savings gained through modernization of business operations

What you‚Äôll Need to Succeed:

At least 2-5+ years of experience working as an Analyst with experience in analytics/data science/insights/strategy/BI
Advanced working knowledge and hands-on experience in SQL
Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in data visualization tools such as Tableau (preferably) 
Expert domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, Python (or R)
Bachelor‚Äôs degree ideally in a business or quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
A good understanding of statistical modelling knowledge or any machine learning technique knowledge (such as hypothesis testing, regression, logistic regression, random forest, etc.)
Good stakeholder management experience. Comfortable presenting to senior leadership and C-suite.
Experience in conducting A/B testing experimentation
Strong experience in finding data insights and provide business recommendation to the business
A hacker‚Äôs mindset ‚Äì the ability to build simple but clever and elegant solutions to new problems within significant resource, operational and time constraints through deep understanding of the business, creative problem solving, and a wide range of expertise in data, analytics, automation, programming, and prototyping.
Excellent communicator with superior written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal communication skills.
Data driven in both decision making and performance measurement.
Extreme comfort in ambiguous, fast-paced environment.
Ability to multi-task, prioritize and coordinate resources.

It‚Äôs Great if you Have: 

MBA or Masters in a quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
Program management certifications (e.g. PMI, PRINCE2) to compliment your program management experience.
Asian market experience.
Travel industry / e-commerce / tech / consulting experience.

About the job
We‚Äôre UnitAry, a fast-moving team where creativity meets execution ‚Äî and every big move needs a strong financial backbone. We‚Äôre looking for a Finance, Accounting & Tax Officer who can keep our numbers sharp, our payments smooth, and our reports clean.
