You‚Äôll be the one who keeps our financial engine running steady while we scale fast.
If you‚Äôre detail-oriented, reliable, and love balancing both numbers and deadlines, you‚Äôll fit right in.

üéØ What You‚Äôll Be Doing:
Manage daily bookkeeping, record journal entries, and maintain accurate financial data.
Handle payments, reimbursements, and petty cash processes.
Prepare monthly financial reports and assist in management reporting.
Ensure compliance with local tax regulations (PPH, PPN, etc.) and support monthly/annual filings.
Work closely with vendors and internal teams for payment verification and documentation.
Support external audit and liaise with accounting consultants when needed.

‚úÖ What We‚Äôre Looking For:

3‚Äì5 years of experience in finance, accounting, or tax functions.

Collaborative team that values speed, ownership, and precision.
Space to grow, learn, and make a visible impact.

About the job
Company Description
YOUR! (formerly known as Yourpay) is a neobank focused on empowering and transforming the lives of underbanked mothers and families in rural areas of Indonesia. We provide a secure, affordable, and user-friendly platform for Indonesian migrant workers worldwide to make payments, transfers, and soon offer lending and savings services.

Our comprehensive infrastructure covers five pillars of financial transactions: payment, lending, insurance, investment, and saving. With over 2 million transactions and 60,000 active users across various countries, including Indonesia, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Singapore, and soon Korea, Malaysia and Saudi Arabia, we aim to enable migrant workers and their families to access proper financial services and take control of their earnings.

Role Description
We are seeking a Product Designer for creating and improving the user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) of digital products to ensure they are intuitive, visually appealing, and meet user needs effectively. Their role combines creativity with user research and technical knowledge to design functional and user-friendly digital experiences.

Responsibilities
User Research: Conduct in-depth user research through interviews, surveys, usability tests, and data analysis to gather insights about the target audience. Use this information to understand user needs, preferences, pain points, and behavior patterns, which will guide design decisions and ensure that the product is user-centered.
Wireframing and Prototyping: Create wireframes, which are basic, low-fidelity representations of the product layout, to map out the structure and flow of content. Develop interactive prototypes that allow stakeholders and users to visualize and interact with key elements and functionalities of the product. Prototypes are used to test ideas and gather feedback before moving into full-scale design.
Information Architecture: Organize and structure content in a way that is intuitive and logical for users. Define how information is grouped, labeled, and accessed within the product to ensure that users can easily find the information they need. This includes creating site maps, user flows, and navigation systems that guide users through the product efficiently.
Visual Design: Design appealing and consistent visual elements such as buttons, icons, typography, and color schemes that enhance the product‚Äôs aesthetics. Ensure that the UI reflects the brand‚Äôs identity and is consistent across all platforms. This involves attention to detail in layout, spacing, and responsiveness, making sure that the product looks and feels polished on various devices.
Interaction Design: Focus on how users will interact with the product by designing intuitive and engaging user interactions. This includes creating animations, transitions, and feedback responses (e.g., hover effects, button clicks) that make the interface feel responsive and smooth. These elements enhance the overall user experience by making the product more dynamic and engaging.
Collaboration with Cross-Functional Teams: Work closely with product managers, developers, and stakeholders throughout the design and development process. Ensure that designs are aligned with business objectives and technical constraints. Act as a liaison between design and development teams to ensure smooth handoffs and that the final product stays true to the original design vision.
Design Systems and Standards: Develop and maintain a consistent design system that includes reusable UI components, style guides, and design principles. This helps ensure uniformity across different parts of the product and across teams. Design systems allow for efficient collaboration, scalability, and quicker development cycles while maintaining a cohesive user experience.

Requirements
Education: Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Design, Computer Science, Software Engineering, or Related Field
Experience: 2+ years of experience in UI/UX design or product design.
Design Skills:
Proficiency with Design Tools: Figma
Prototyping and Wireframing Skills: Ability to create wireframes and interactive prototypes using tools such as Figma, or Whimsical.
Visual Design Skills: Strong understanding of typography, color theory, layout, and composition to create visually appealing interfaces that are aligned with brand guidelines.
User-Centered Design Knowledge:
Understanding of UX Principles: Knowledge of user-centered design principles, including how to create designs that are intuitive, user-friendly, and meet the needs of the target audience.
Information Architecture (IA): Ability to organize content logically and create clear navigation structures, sitemaps, and user flows.
Understanding of Front-End Development (Preferred):
Basic HTML/CSS/JavaScript Knowledge (Optional): Familiarity with front-end technologies to better communicate with developers and understand the limitations and possibilities of design implementations.
Adaptability and Continuous Learning:
Up-to-date with Industry Trends: Willingness to stay current with evolving UI/UX design trends, tools, and best practices.
Adaptability: Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and adapt to changing requirements and user needs.
Portfolio of Work:
Impressive Design Portfolio: A strong portfolio showcasing previous UI/UX projects, detailing the design process, wireframes, prototypes, final designs, and how user feedback was incorporated to improve the product.
Collaboration and Communication Skills: Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.

Please submit your CV to recruitment@yourpay.co.id with email SUBJECT: Product Designer - Name

job_title: Business Analyst (Supply Analytics, Bangkok-based, Relocation provided)
job_description:
About the job
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,‚ÄØenhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Our Purpose - Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (WITH RELOCATION PROVIDED)

Location: Bangkok, Thailand (*Not open for remote work)

Get to Know our Team:

As part of the Supply Analytics, you will be responsible for identifying new partners and opportunities, cultivating a relationship with them, and working together with them to deliver the best outcome for our end customers. You would also be responsible with managing the day-to-day interaction with the partner and working closely with other teams within Agoda to ensure the partners needs are met.

We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda‚Äôs unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.

The Opportunity: 

As a Business Analyst, you will report directly to either the Senior Manager or Associate Director within the Supply Department and this will be an individual contributor role. You will be responsible and fully empowered to work with the partners on the ground. You will be supported by a team within the Supply department and work closely with other Team members within Agoda.

In this Role, you‚Äôll get to:

Translate internal briefs into analytical projects (to include refining the initial brief and asking the ‚Äòright questions‚Äô, working through potential hypotheses and storyboarding the output)
Use and analyze data from multiple large-scale data warehouses and present statistically strong analysis to a wide range of business stakeholders.
Proactively identify opportunities for growth within supply and the wider business.
Drive new analytical initiatives and projects aimed at improving organizational efficiency and shaping Agoda supply.
Identify, support, and lead projects aimed at scaling up the way the Supply organization leverages on data, insights, and intelligence.
Automate manual operational processes and present back on time savings gained through modernization of business operations

What you‚Äôll Need to Succeed:

At least 2-5+ years of experience working as an Analyst with experience in analytics/data science/insights/strategy/BI
Advanced working knowledge and hands-on experience in SQL
Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in data visualization tools such as Tableau (preferably) 
Expert domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, Python (or R)
Bachelor‚Äôs degree ideally in a business or quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
A good understanding of statistical modelling knowledge or any machine learning technique knowledge (such as hypothesis testing, regression, logistic regression, random forest, etc.)
Good stakeholder management experience. Comfortable presenting to senior leadership and C-suite.
Experience in conducting A/B testing experimentation
Strong experience in finding data insights and provide business recommendation to the business
A hacker‚Äôs mindset ‚Äì the ability to build simple but clever and elegant solutions to new problems within significant resource, operational and time constraints through deep understanding of the business, creative problem solving, and a wide range of expertise in data, analytics, automation, programming, and prototyping.
Excellent communicator with superior written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal communication skills.
Data driven in both decision making and performance measurement.
Extreme comfort in ambiguous, fast-paced environment.
Ability to multi-task, prioritize and coordinate resources.

It‚Äôs Great if you Have: 

MBA or Masters in a quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
Program management certifications (e.g. PMI, PRINCE2) to compliment your program management experience.
Asian market experience.
Travel industry / e-commerce / tech / consulting experience.

job_title: Senior Local Planning and Data Governance Specialist
job_description:
About the job
Indonesia

Senior Local Planning and Data Governance Specialist

Organization

DT Global

Posted 5 Nov 2025 Closing date 19 Nov 2025

Location: Remote

Program Background

Responsibilities

The SKALA Program is a significant Australian investment designed to help Indonesia address regional disparities in development. SKALA will contribute to this objective by strengthening selected elements of Indonesia‚Äôs large and complex decentralised government system responsible for the delivery of basic services (Layanan Dasar). The SKALA Program‚Äôs core approach is to facilitate better collaboration (Kolaborasi) between Indonesian government stakeholders, at national and subnational levels, to help realise synergies (Sinergi) that will trigger improved service delivery. Moreover, SKALA will build on, and take to scale, the successes and learning from Australia‚Äôs previous 19 years of support to Indonesia‚Äôs decentralised government system. The SKALA Program is to be implemented through the following three pillars:

Pillar 1: Stronger national level enabling environment for sub-national service delivery.
Pillar 2: Better sub-national governance for service delivery.
Pillar 3: Greater participation, representation and influence for women, people with disabilities and vulnerable groups.

SKALA is implemented at the national level with an office in Jakarta and at the subnational level with offices in Aceh, Nusa Tenggara Barat, Nusa Tenggara Timur, Maluku, Gorontalo, Kalimantan Utara, Tanah Papua. In addition to the 3 pillars, SKALA works across 4 general themes of Public Financial Management, Minimum Service Standards, Data and Analysis and GEDSI.

About DT Global Asia Pacific

At DT Global Asia Pacific, we aim to positively impact people‚Äôs lives through delivery excellence. As a leading implementing partner across Asia and the Pacific, we co-create locally led solutions in partnership with governments, communities, and stakeholders. We bring together talented teams and deep regional expertise to deliver initiatives that promote inclusive economic growth, essential services, and resilient, secure communities. With over 1,500 staff, experts in 22+ countries and more than 60 years of development experience, we tackle complex community, national and transnational challenges ‚Äî from governance and justice systems to climate resilience, infrastructure and social equity ‚Äî with innovative thinking and a commitment to long-term impact.

For more information, please see www.dt-global.com

The Role

The Senior Local Planning and Data Governance Specialist will support SKALA and its government counterparts, such as Bappenas, MOHA and MOF by providing technical input to improve socio-economic based data analysis using DTSEN to be included in web application SEPAKAT (Bappenas) and interop with other systems such as SIPD (MOHA) and SIKD (MOF). The Consultant will also provide technical input to enhance SEPAKAT utilization through the development of Executive Dashboards for high level officials and line ministries (KL) in developing evidence-based program planning and targeting to address basic services needs and poverty reduction.The Consultant will collaborate closely with SKALA‚Äôs GEDSI, PFM, and MSS teams at both national and sub-national levels to ensure coherence, synergy, and effective integration of data into planning and budgeting processes.

Click on the link or copy paste it to access the full Terms of Reference for this position:

https://tinyurl.com/4f4sze9y

About You

Specific Responsibilities

 Provide technical input for the development and enhancement of exeutive dashboards for high level officials including Ministers and Echelon I, byutilizing DTSEN, macro data and central government data to support evidence-based decision-making.
Provide technical input to adjust and refine SEPAKAT features and menus for macro and micro socio-economic data analysis, ensuring practical use for planning and budgeting at national and sub-national levels for poverty reduction and access to basic services (referring to SPM indicators).
Provide mapping of the condition of Village Information System in Tanah Papua and assist the governance of OAP data in Village Information System and its existence in socio-economic data ecosystems.
Provide policy and technical advisory to the current design of local institutional setting for the utilisation of SEPAKAT and its integration to other existing government system, including with locally generated data systems, i.e. regional data portal
Advisory input in the national policy in related to data governance, use of micro socio-economic data including through but not limited to SEPAKAT and SIPD.
Provide technical input on the identification and analytical process and variable of several development indicators, such as poverty, midterm development planning, MSS, climate change, etc to be processed through SEPAKAT and data portal system.
Support the development curriculum matrix, syllabus, and training modules for SEPAKAT utilization in consultation with key ministries related and relevant SKALA unit.
Provide input as requested by supervisor.

Other Duties

Comply with DFAT, DT Global and SKALA policies on gender, disability, fraud and anticorruption, child protection, PSEAH and the environment.
Ensure compliance and adherence to various operational policies, guidelines and manuals issued by DT Global and SKALA.

Job Requirements

Work environment involves only infrequent exposure to disagreeable elements and minor physical exertion and/or strain.
Work may require long, and flexible hours as needed. Travel is based on need.

Deliverables

Documented technical input for the development and enhancement of leadership dashboards at Ministerial and Echelon I levels, utilizing DTSEN and other central government data (SIKD, e-SPM, SIPD)
Documented input on the adjustment and refinement of SEPAKAT features and menus for micro socio-economic data analysis, ensuring usability for national and sub-national planning and budgeting.
Documented input on the GEDSI analysis, including design, data sources and analysis formula to be applied in the SEPAKAT system, that includes but not limited to MSS, poverty, midterm development documents, geo-tagging, climate change issues, etc.
Inventory of planning and budgeting analysis and required data necessary for digital platform, including SEPAKAT, SIPD (e-walidata & e-database) and Regional Data Portal.
Documented input to design guidelines, user manual, and training modules for for the preparation and implementation of socio-economic data updating.
Documented input to curriculum matrix, syllabus and training modules for use of micro socio-economic data (through SEPAKAT, SIPD, data portal) training in consultation with key ministries related and relevant SKALA unit.
Documented input on development and scaling out of village information system in Tanah Papua and integrated socio-economic data (DTSEN) with disaggregated information on OAP and Non-OAP for Otsus based planning.

Relationship Management

The role will be working closely with the Data and Analytics unit and Government counterparts, under close coordination and reporting to the Data and Analytic Lead.

Selection Criteria

Essential

Master‚Äôs degree in Social Sciences, Development Studies, Political Science, Business Administration or related subjects and at least has 15 years experiences;
Demonstrate skills and experiences on poverty, MSS, budget and realization and GEDSI data analysis and the use of SEPAKAT, data portal and executive dashboard system;
Familiarity of information systems used by sub-national governments in planning and budgeting, i.e. SIPD, e-SPM, e-walidata, data portal and SIPD-Hub;
Demonstrate skills and experiences on local planning and budgeting process and link with one data governance and use of relevant analysis;
Demonstrate skills and experience in the micro data processing and use for provision basic services and social protection targeting;
Experience in development of training curriculum, syllabus, modules and the use of Learning Management System (LMS).
Experienced working on governance program involving government and development partners;
Able to analyse and present complex information; strong presentation, communications and writing skills in both English and Bahasa Indonesia;
Proven record of strong performance working in teams (teamwork) as well as working independently to deliver quality work.
Fluency in Bahasa Indonesia and English languages
Understanding of gender equality and social inclusion issues.

Preferred

Experienced working on community development projects involving government and development partners, especially related to social protection for people with disabilities.
Experienced working with Government of Indonesia.

How to apply

How To Apply

Click the link to apply: Senior Local Planning and Data Governance Specialist

Please submit

 Your CV
 A cover letter addressing the selection criteria

APPLICATIONS CLOSE Wednesday, 19 November 2025, max 5 PM Jakarta Time

Encouraging Applications From People With Disabilities

As part of our commitment to inclusion, we actively encourage applications from people with disabilities (PWDs). We are also committed to providing reasonable accommodation throughout the recruitment process and in the workplace to support the success and well-being of employees with disabilities. Candidates requiring any adjustments to participate equitably, may contact SKALA People & Culture unit at recruitment@skala.or.id and we will work with the candidate to find the right solution. This information is strictly confidential; used solely to strengthen our inclusive hiring efforts and ensure we provide any support needed. Your disclosure will not impact on recruitment decisions.

Should this role be of interest, we encourage you to apply as soon as possible. Kindly note only shortlisted applicants will be contacted.

DT Global is committed to child protection and safeguarding the welfare of children in the delivery of our international development programs. We are committed to Safety and the Prevention of Sexual Abuse and Harassment (PSEAH), and bribery prevention. DT Global is an equal opportunity employer and we encourage women, men, people with diverse backgrounds and people living with disabilities to apply. This program is funded by the Australian Government and Managed by DT Global.

About us

About the job
Mobile Developer Application Medilink
We are actively developing Southeast Asia's top TPA, which makes it easier for consumers to obtain insurance. To achieve our objectives, we therefore require talent with great potential, like you, to join our expanding organization, acquire the necessary skills, and also form outstanding teams.

Responsibilities
Design, develop, and maintain high-quality mobile applications for Android and/or iOS platforms.
Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams (UI/UX designers, backend developers, product managers) to define, design, and deliver new features.
Ensure application performance, quality, and responsiveness through clean and efficient code.
Identify and fix bugs, performance bottlenecks, and usability issues.
Integrate mobile applications with backend services and APIs securely and efficiently.
Stay up to date with emerging mobile technologies, tools, and industry trends.
Participate in code reviews and contribute to continuous improvement of development standards.
Support the deployment, testing, and maintenance of mobile applications in production environments.

Qualifications
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
Proven experience as a Mobile Application Developer (Android, iOS, or cross-platform such as Flutter or React Native).
Strong understanding of mobile development frameworks, RESTful APIs, and version control (e.g., Git).
Proficiency in programming languages such as Kotlin, Swift, Dart, or JavaScript/TypeScript.
Experience with mobile UI/UX design principles and responsive design.
Familiarity with Firebase, push notifications, app store deployment, and third-party integrations.
Excellent problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and ability to work independently or as part of a team.
Good communication skills and readiness to collaborate with multiple stakeholders.
(Optional) Willingness to work in a hybrid or shifting schedule environment if required.

About MEDILINK DIGITAL MEDIKA
PT Medilink Digital Medika has established a strategic and technological collaboration with Medilink-Global Asia Pte Ltd. Through this collaboration, the company shall enjoy the exclusive rights of use of the bespoke Electronic Claims Clearing System (ECCS 5.0), a time-tested and proven solutions which have been implemented successfully and are functioning effectively at insurance companies and TPAs in several countries. The collaboration also allows the company to gain immediate access to Medilink-Global‚Äôs international network of health care providers.

Our vision is to be the Preferred Employee Benefit And Health Insurance Management Portal in Indonesia, offering anytime-anywhere Medical Claims Management Tools that connect the Payors, Healthcare Providers and Members.

Our mission is we provide connected Digital Solution for Insurance Companies and Corporates. Enabling them to offer their Members Seamless Access to Quality & Equitable Healthcare at Domestic and Regional Health Facilities.

Medilink is committed not only to make insurance easily available for everyone but also to spread awareness about the importance of having financial plans and protection through insurance.

job_title: Business Development Representative (AU & UK Market) - Remote
job_description:
About the job
Are you a sharp B2B sales pro in Indonesia, ready to level up your career with a global, remote-first company? Join Influx.com, a fast-scaling company that‚Äôs disrupting the traditional customer experience and talent industries. We help global companies build flexible, high-performing teams, and we need your talent to drive our growth.

This is your chance to build a commercial career in Indonesia while selling into high-value AU and UK markets!

üéØ What You'll Be Doing
As our remote Business Development Representative, you'll be the engine that drives our qualified deal flow for fast-moving, digital-first clients. You'll play a key role in lead generation and be responsible for bringing in real business from inbound conversations.
Own the Pipeline: Engage with warm inbound leads and manage early-stage deal flow in collaboration with our closers.
Generate Business: Drive both inbound and outbound prospecting and lead generation to build a high-quality B2B pipeline.
Keep Momentum: Nurture deals and ensure consistent follow-ups to keep the sales process moving.

‚úÖ What We're Looking For
We're looking for an ambitious professional with at least 3-5 years of proven success in a B2B sales environment. You'll need to be a smart, fast learner who can thrive in a high-autonomy, remote-first role.
Strong English Communication: You must have business-level English proficiency (verbal and written) to confidently operate and thrive in conversations with AU/UK stakeholders, decision-makers, and influencers.
Startup/Fast-Growth Experience: You're comfortable navigating fast-growth, high-change sales environments. Experience working in a startup or a similarly rapid scaling environment is a huge plus.
B2B Sales Experience: You have a proven track record in B2B sales, ideally with some full-cycle experience.
Industry Knowledge is Key: Experience working within the outsourcing, BPO, or CX-as-a-Service industry is highly desirable. You understand how to sell services or solutions in a client-facing environment similar to Influx.
Tech Savvy: Comfortable using HubSpot (or a similar CRM) to manage tasks and deal flow.

üåç Why Join Influx?
Global Exposure: Work remotely from Indonesia while getting global exposure.
Autonomy & Support: Enjoy huge autonomy with continuous support from senior sellers and consultants.
Clear Growth: We're a fast-scaling team with clear opportunities for career growth.

Ready to disrupt the industry and build your global sales career? Apply now!

(Please note: Influx will never ask candidates for payment during the recruitment process. Successful candidates will be contacted only through email ending with @influx.com.)

About the job
VP - Senior Product & Engineering

Location: South Jakarta (WFO)
Type: Full Time Employee (FTE)

Company Overview
AI Avatar Indonesia is pioneering the future of emotional AI and digital companionship. Through AI powered chat, voice, and video call experiences, we allow users to interact authentically with AI avatars inspired by real life personalities. Our mission is to blend AI, culture, and creativity to create meaningful digital human connections. As we scale our platform and product ecosystem, we are seeking a VP ‚Äì Senior Product & Engineering to lead our innovation, accelerate technical execution, and drive revenue through product excellence.

Key Responsibilities:
Product strategy and vision; translate market insights, user data, and global directives into localized product strategies. Identify new opportunities for AI driven features (chat, voice, video, gamification, and collectibles). Define and execute the product roadmap aligned with AI Avatar Indonesia's mission and growth objectives.
Product development leadership; lead and manage end to end product lifecycle (from concept, design, development, testing, launch, optimization). Ensure product features meet user satisfaction, performance, and monetization goals. Work cross functionally with Marketing, Community, Affiliate, and Creative teams to align releases with business campaigns.
Engineering management; oversee all engineering divisions (Mobile, Backend, AI/ML, QA, and DevOps). Build scalable and reliable systems that support rapid user growth and feature expansion. Implement best practices in architecture, documentation, and development process. Establish and monitor engineering KPIs.
Localization & user experience; adapt product experiences to suit Indonesian user behavior, language, and culture. Drive continuous UI/UX improvements for engagement and retention. Ensure AI interactions feel natural, emotional, and culturally relevant.
Leadership & collaboration; foster a collaborative and agile environment, encouraging innovation and ownership across teams. Mentor and upskill team leads to ensure technical and managerial growth. Act as the bridge between local operations and global HQ, representing Indonesia's market needs in global discussions.

Requirements:
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or Product Management (MBA preferred).
7 - 10 years of experience in product and engineering management, including at least 5 years in a senior leadership role.
Proven track record in scaling consumer facing apps, ideally in AI, social media, or entertainment technology.
Strong background in AI/ML integration, mobile app architecture, and agile product delivery.
Deep understanding of Indonesian digital behavior and user expectations.
Excellent leadership, analytical and communication skills in English and Bahasa Indonesia.
Passion for AI, culture, and creating emotionally engaging user experiences.

üëâ Apply now or refer someone who‚Äôd be a perfect fit!

job_title: Business Analyst (Supply Analytics, Bangkok-based, Relocation provided)
job_description:
About the job
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,‚ÄØenhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Our Purpose - Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (WITH RELOCATION PROVIDED)

Location: Bangkok, Thailand (*Not open for remote work)

Get to Know our Team:

As part of the Supply Analytics, you will be responsible for identifying new partners and opportunities, cultivating a relationship with them, and working together with them to deliver the best outcome for our end customers. You would also be responsible with managing the day-to-day interaction with the partner and working closely with other teams within Agoda to ensure the partners needs are met.

We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda‚Äôs unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.

The Opportunity: 

As a Business Analyst, you will report directly to either the Senior Manager or Associate Director within the Supply Department and this will be an individual contributor role. You will be responsible and fully empowered to work with the partners on the ground. You will be supported by a team within the Supply department and work closely with other Team members within Agoda.

In this Role, you‚Äôll get to:

Translate internal briefs into analytical projects (to include refining the initial brief and asking the ‚Äòright questions‚Äô, working through potential hypotheses and storyboarding the output)
Use and analyze data from multiple large-scale data warehouses and present statistically strong analysis to a wide range of business stakeholders.
Proactively identify opportunities for growth within supply and the wider business.
Drive new analytical initiatives and projects aimed at improving organizational efficiency and shaping Agoda supply.
Identify, support, and lead projects aimed at scaling up the way the Supply organization leverages on data, insights, and intelligence.
Automate manual operational processes and present back on time savings gained through modernization of business operations

What you‚Äôll Need to Succeed:

At least 2-5+ years of experience working as an Analyst with experience in analytics/data science/insights/strategy/BI
Advanced working knowledge and hands-on experience in SQL
Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in data visualization tools such as Tableau (preferably) 
Expert domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, Python (or R)
Bachelor‚Äôs degree ideally in a business or quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
A good understanding of statistical modelling knowledge or any machine learning technique knowledge (such as hypothesis testing, regression, logistic regression, random forest, etc.)
Good stakeholder management experience. Comfortable presenting to senior leadership and C-suite.
Experience in conducting A/B testing experimentation
Strong experience in finding data insights and provide business recommendation to the business
A hacker‚Äôs mindset ‚Äì the ability to build simple but clever and elegant solutions to new problems within significant resource, operational and time constraints through deep understanding of the business, creative problem solving, and a wide range of expertise in data, analytics, automation, programming, and prototyping.
Excellent communicator with superior written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal communication skills.
Data driven in both decision making and performance measurement.
Extreme comfort in ambiguous, fast-paced environment.
Ability to multi-task, prioritize and coordinate resources.

It‚Äôs Great if you Have: 

MBA or Masters in a quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
Program management certifications (e.g. PMI, PRINCE2) to compliment your program management experience.
Asian market experience.
Travel industry / e-commerce / tech / consulting experience.

Persetujuan Pelamar

SRI tidak memungut biaya apapun selama proses rekrutmen.
Informasi dan data yang pelamar berikan selama proses rekrutmen SRI adalah benar dan sesungguhnya. Jika ditemukan adanya informasi dan data yang tidak valid, maka SRI dapat menghentikan proses rekrutmen pelamar.
Data pribadi pelamar hanya akan digunakan untuk kepentingan proses rekrutmen. SRI tidak akan membagikan informasi pribadi pelamar kepada individu atau organisasi lain tanpa seizin pelamar, kecuali jika dibutuhkan secara hukum.
Pelamar menyetujui memberikan data sesuai yang di minta oleh SRI
Pelamar menyetujui data yang diberikan untuk digunakan oleh SRI selama proses rekrutmen.

Proses Recruitment di PT Suryaraya Rubberindo Industries TIDAK dipungut biaya apapun

About the job
PT Dian Swastatika Sentosa Tbk or its subsidiaries are looking for high potential candidates to be employed as Corporate Finance (Equity Research) with the following details:

Requirements
Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or a related field from a reputable university.
Minimum 5 years of experience in corporate finance, equity research, or investment analysis, preferably within the technology industry.
Proven experience in conducting financial due diligence, valuation, and industry analysis for technology-related businesses.
Strong proficiency in financial modeling, including forecasting, scenario analysis, and sensitivity modeling.
In-depth understanding of capital markets, M&A transactions, and investment structuring.
Excellent analytical, quantitative, and problem-solving skills with a strong attention to detail.
Advanced skills in Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint, and financial analysis tools.
Strong presentation and communication skills, with the ability to clearly convey complex financial concepts to non-financial stakeholders.
Able to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.

Job Descriptions
Conduct equity research and financial due diligence on potential investment targets, particularly in the technology sector.
Develop and maintain detailed financial models to support business valuation, scenario planning, and decision-making processes.
Analyze market trends, competitor performance, and emerging technologies to identify new investment opportunities.
Prepare and present investment proposals, reports, and pitch decks for management and board-level discussions.
Support M&A activities, including deal evaluation, financial feasibility studies, and post-merger integration analysis.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams (finance, strategy, and legal) to ensure the accuracy and completeness of financial assessments.
Monitor portfolio performance and provide insights or recommendations for optimization.
Participate in strategic planning and capital allocation discussions to support the company‚Äôs growth initiatives.

About the job
Deskripsi Peran 
Ini adalah peran General Manager Operations FnB penuh waktu di lokasi Jakarta. General Manager Operations FnB akan mengawasi operasi bisnis sehari-hari, memastikan fungsi berjalan lancar dan efisiensi operasional.

Tugas dan tanggung jawab mencakup:
Penyusunan anggaran (budgeting).
Memastikan kepuasan pelanggan.
Mengembangkan rencana strategis untuk meningkatkan proses.
Mengkoordinasikan dengan berbagai departemen.
Menyelesaikan setiap masalah operasional.
Memastikan perusahaan mencapai target kinerjanya.
Mengelola performa operasional outlet dan area bisnis, termasuk sales, COGS, food cost, dan efisiensi manpower untuk mencapai target KPI operasional dan profitabilitas (P&L) sesuai target.
Menjamin konsistensi kualitas produk, layanan, dan pengalaman pelanggan (customer experience) di seluruh outlet untuk menjaga standar QSC (Quality, Service, Cleanliness) dan Tingkat kepuasan pelanggan yang tinggi.
Mengembangkan inovasi produk dan konsep menu bersama tim PDV dan Marketing sesuai tren pasar dan positioning brand untuk menghasilkan produk baru yang relevan, menguntungkan, dan memperkuat citra brand.

Kualifikasi
Mahir dalam keterampilan General Manager dan Operation Manager.
Berpengalaman di bidang Customer Service dan Team Management.
Keterampilan yang kuat dalam Budgeting dan pengawasan keuangan.
Keterampilan kepemimpinan dan komunikasi yang sangat baik.
Kemampuan untuk bekerja secara efektif di lingkungan yang serba cepat.
Gelar Sarjana (S1) di bidang Administrasi Bisnis, Manajemen, atau bidang terkait.
Pengalaman di industri restoran atau perhotelan merupakan nilai tambah.

About the job
Role: Create high-performing, native TikToks that turn brand strategy into scroll-stopping stories driving awareness, engagement, and conversion for the Indonesia market, aligned with Marketing & Campaign and Social Media plans.

WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL DO :
Ideation & Scripting: Convert briefs/content calendars into hooks, angles, and short scripts; follow trends without losing brand voice.

Collaborative with Marketing, Social, and Design; data-driven literation.
Available to WFO in Yogyakarta & join ASAP.

About the job
The Head of Finance will work closely with the Finance Team, external clients as well as other internal departments. The Head of Finance will oversee the financial activities of an organization, forecast financial results, manage country budgets and conduct risk management.

Responsibilities:
Oversee the preparation of financial reporting in compliance with local and regional accounting standards at a local and regional consolidated level
Oversee and maintain daily transactions and control of all accounting systems to ensure accurate recording and processing of financial and accounting data in compliance with international procedures, statutory rules and accounting standards
Supervise operational finance activities to ensure accurate, timely and efficient closing of financial statements for statutory and management purposed
Implement and formulate of the consistent accounting rules, procedures and implement the procedures across the business
Establish monthly management reporting and templates for each entity and at consolidated level to help business-making decisions
Manage the operational finance team to ensure payment are made on time in accurate and complete basis
Review internal audit and control systems and brings about any improvement whenever necessary and consistent implementation across all departments and assets
Participate in budgeting process and support regional finance team on budget control
Liaise with internal and external auditor, tax auditor and ensure all statutory requirements deliver in a timely manner and in compliance with the regulations
Ensure all monthly tax, tax returns and other tax requirements are filled within the deadlines and as per the requirements by tax authorities
Support asset acquisition and potential acquisitions by the company or group
Develop and adhere to policies and procedures

Qualifications
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Accounting. CPA is a must 
Minimum of 10 years‚Äô experience under Finance/Accounting department with 4 years leadership experience
Good knowledge of IFRS, general accounting standards and financial matters
Good knowledge on local tax regulations
High integrity and commitment to good governance

Preferred Skills:
Initial audit background is a plus
Start-up, fintech, e-commerce industry background is a plus
Ability to work independently and play a hands-on role in a dynamic, challenging and fast-paced environment
Strong analytical, interpersonal and relationship building skills
Strong verbal and written communication skills coupled with excellent presentation skills
Highly motivated and driven, with good integrity and a strong sense of accountability and focused on delivering results
Strong drive for excellence in operational performance
Proven ability to thrive in constantly changing, fast pace and ambiguous work environment

About the role:

As a Sales Associate at Berca Sportindo (League), you will play a vital role in delivering an excellent customer experience and driving-increasing sales in our bustling retail stores in Jakarta and BSD Area. This full-time position will see you working on the front lines, interacting with customers, and showcasing our high-quality range of Footwear, Sporting goods and apparel.

What you'll be doing:
1. Do Hard Selling, Soft Selling, Up Selling, Cross Selling, and Close Selling to achieve the Sales Target

2. Demonstrating and promoting our products to customers, ensuring they have all the information needed to make informed purchasing decisions

3. Providing exceptional customer service and building strong relationships with customers

4. Regularly reach out to customers listed in personal phone contacts to drive sales and achieve sales targets 

5. Handling cash and card transactions efficiently and accurately

6. Maintaining a clean, well-organised and visually appealing store environment

7. Assisting with inventory management and stock replenishment as needed

8. Collaborating with the retail team to achieve and exceed sales targets

What we're looking for:

1. Previous experience in a customer-facing retail or sales role, preferably within the sporting goods industry

2. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage with customers and provide a friendly, helpful service

3. Strong product knowledge and a passion for sports and fitness

4. Enthusiasm, energy and a positive attitude to deliver an outstanding customer experience

5. Ability to work collaboratively as part of a team and contribute to the overall success of the store

6. Flexibility to work a range of shifts, including evenings and weekends, as required

What we offer:

At Berca Sportindo (League), we are committed to supporting the growth and development of our employees. In this role, you will have the opportunity to develop your sales and customer service skills, as well as learn about the latest trends and technologies in the sporting goods industry. We offer competitive remuneration, a range of employee discounts.

About us

League entered Indonesia's footwear industry in 2004 and quickly gained a reputation as a premium brand for its quality footwear, apparel and accessories for men and women, everyday athletes to active-lifestyle enthusiasts.

We have more than 20 years of design, manufacturing and retail experience behind us, including working with some of the world's most valuable sports brands such as Nike and Puma. The core of our products lies within our stylish yet functional footwear line, which includes a fantastic collection of running, futsal, basketball and lifestyle shoes. We also sponsor prestigious national and international sporting and lifestyle events. The highlight was in 2012, when we proudly sponsored the Indonesian national team at the London Olympics.

As we continue to expand our presence across the country, we are seeking talented individuals to join our dynamic team and contribute to our ongoing success.

Apply now to become part of the Berca Sportindo (League) family!

About the job
Indonesia

Regional Public Finance Management Specialist

Organization

DT Global

Posted 5 Nov 2025 Closing date 19 Nov 2025

Location: Remote

Program Background

Responsibilities

The SKALA Program is a significant Australian investment designed to help Indonesia address regional disparities in development. SKALA will contribute to this objective by strengthening selected elements of Indonesia‚Äôs large and complex decentralised government system responsible for the delivery of basic services (Layanan Dasar). The SKALA Program‚Äôs core approach is to facilitate better collaboration (Kolaborasi) between Indonesian government stakeholders, at national and subnational levels, to help realise synergies (Sinergi) that will trigger improved service delivery. Moreover, SKALA will build on, and take to scale, the successes and learning from Australia‚Äôs previous 19 years of support to Indonesia‚Äôs decentralised government system. The SKALA Program is to be implemented through the following three pillars:

Pillar 1: Stronger national level enabling environment for sub-national service delivery.
Pillar 2: Better sub-national governance for service delivery.
Pillar 3: Greater participation, representation and influence for women, people with disabilities and vulnerable groups.

SKALA is implemented at the national level with an office in Jakarta and at the subnational level with offices in Aceh, Nusa Tenggara Barat, Nusa Tenggara Timur, Maluku, Gorontalo, Kalimantan Utara, Tanah Papua. In addition to the 3 pillars, SKALA works across 4 general themes of Public Financial Management, Minimum Service Standards, Data and Analysis and GEDSI.

About DT Global Asia Pacific

At DT Global Asia Pacific, we aim to positively impact people‚Äôs lives through delivery excellence. As a leading implementing partner across Asia and the Pacific, we co-create locally led solutions in partnership with governments, communities, and stakeholders. We bring together talented teams and deep regional expertise to deliver initiatives that promote inclusive economic growth, essential services, and resilient, secure communities. With over 1,500 staff, experts in 22+ countries and more than 60 years of development experience, we tackle complex community, national and transnational challenges ‚Äî from governance and justice systems to climate resilience, infrastructure and social equity ‚Äî with innovative thinking and a commitment to long-term impact.

For more information, please see www.dt-global.com

The Role

The Regional Public Finance Management Specialist will be responsible to provide technical input on regional finance and accounting aspects to provincial government in Papua, in their efforts to improve service delivery at sub-national level and; ensuring greater participation, representation and influence of women, people with disabilities and vulnerable groups

Provide training and assistances to local governments in Special Autonomy Fund budgeting and accounting as well as reporting.
Provide training to local governments in MSS budgeting and monitoring.
Provide training and assistances to local government in local fiscal capacity calculation and preparation of regional finance document.
Provide training and assistances to local government in GEDSI budgeting, accounting and reporting.

Other Duties

Comply with DFAT, DT Global and SKALA policies on gender, disability, fraud and anticorruption, child protection, PSEAH and the environment.

job_title: Request for Proposal (RfP): Policy Recommendations on Green Cooperatives
job_description:
About the job
Background and Context
Rumah Energi is seeking proposals from qualified individual consultants or consulting firms to develop a Policy Paper ‚ÄúGreen Cooperatives in Building a Renewable Energy Cooperative Ecosystem as a Strategy for Climate Crisis Mitigation in Indonesia‚Äù. This activity is part of the Green Cooperative Policy Readiness Project (GERCEP) aiming to strengthen the role of cooperatives as key actors in driving community-based clean energy transition and the green economy.

Objective
To produce an integrated and actionable policy recommendation that supports the role of Green Cooperatives in accelerating renewable energy‚Äìbased cooperatives as part of Indonesia‚Äôs national climate crisis mitigation strategy.

Scope of Work
Review and analyze existing cooperative and renewable energy regulations.
Identify regulatory gaps and propose new or updated policy options.
Formulate actionable recommendations and a roadmap for implementing renewable energy cooperatives.
Develop a comprehensive Policy Paper and presentation materials summarizing key findings and recommendations.

üìÖ Proposal submission deadline: November 10, 2025 ‚Äî 17:00 WIB
üìß Send proposals to: info@rumahenergi.org (cc: j.irene@rumahenergi.org)

About the Program
The Green Cooperative Program by Rumah Energi has supported over 150 cooperatives across Indonesia in integrating Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) principles into their governance and business practices. Through the GERCEP project, Rumah Energi advocates for national-level renewable energy cooperative policies to strengthen community ownership and participation in Indonesia‚Äôs climate resilience efforts.

Please visit https://www.rumahenergi.org/job for the details.

job_title: BI Analyst (Supply Analytics, Bangkok-based, Relocation provided)
job_description:
About the job
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,‚ÄØenhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Our Purpose - Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (WITH RELOCATION PROVIDED)

Location: Bangkok, Thailand (*Not open for remote work)

Get to Know our Team:

As part of the Supply Analytics, you will be responsible for identifying new partners and opportunities, cultivating a relationship with them, and working together with them to deliver the best outcome for our end customers. You would also be responsible with managing the day-to-day interaction with the partner and working closely with other teams within Agoda to ensure the partners needs are met.

We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda‚Äôs unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.

The Opportunity: 

As a BI Analyst, you will report directly to either the Senior Manager or Associate Director within the Supply Department and this will be an individual contributor role. You will be responsible and fully empowered to work with the partners on the ground. You will be supported by a team within the Supply department and work closely with other Team members within Agoda.

In this Role, you‚Äôll get to:

Translate internal briefs into analytical projects (to include refining the initial brief and asking the ‚Äòright questions‚Äô, working through potential hypotheses and storyboarding the output)
Use and analyze data from multiple large-scale data warehouses and present statistically strong analysis to a wide range of business stakeholders.
Proactively identify opportunities for growth within supply and the wider business.
Drive new analytical initiatives and projects aimed at improving organizational efficiency and shaping Agoda supply.
Identify, support, and lead projects aimed at scaling up the way the Supply organization leverages on data, insights, and intelligence.
Automate manual operational processes and present back on time savings gained through modernization of business operations

What you‚Äôll Need to Succeed:

At least 2-5+ years of experience working as an Analyst with experience in analytics/data science/insights/strategy/BI
Advanced working knowledge and hands-on experience in SQL
Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in data visualization tools such as Tableau (preferably) 
Expert domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, Python (or R)

About the job
Partnership Sales Manager

Are you ready to lead the charge and be at the forefront of our ambitious global expansion? Is hunting, pitching and prospecting second nature to you? Can you confidently agree high-value commercial deals with building owners? Is business development in your blood? And are you relentless in your pursuit of delivering results, with the determination and resilience to change the world of work?

If yes, we need to talk.

What We Can Do For You

You‚Äôre reading the right ad if you‚Äôre looking for:

The most exciting growth opportunity in the world, where you‚Äôll be challenged every day
Excellent training, development and promotion opportunities
A fantastic incentive scheme which can see you earn great commission and prizes.


We know we can only succeed if we give all our people every opportunity to shine. It‚Äôs why so many of our most senior leaders started their careers in our centres. And it‚Äôs what made IWG the dominant global leader in the flexible-workspace industry.

About IWG

IWG is the world‚Äôs leading flexible workspace provider - with the world‚Äôs most ambitious growth programme to open 30,000+ new centres over the next decade to complement our international network of 4,000+ tech-enabled, sustainable and inspiring flexible work centres. Across our multiple brands, including Regus, Spaces, HQ and Signature, we‚Äôre provide world-beating workplace solutions to over 80% of Fortune 500 companies, including Netflix, EY, Amazon and Uber, as well as to local small start-ups, entrepreneurs and emerging businesses.

About You

You‚Äôll need to be passionate about working in a high-growth sector and ready to play a leading role in disrupting the commercial real-estate industry. You‚Äôll excel at growing your network rapidly and taking our proposition to them. And you‚Äôll thrive on initiating and closing multiple high-value deals at pace driven by your tenacity and expertise.

Whether pursuing your own leads or following up on centrally-driven enquiries, you‚Äôll highlight what makes an IWG partnership so special. By ensuring prospective partners fully understand the value of our proposition, you‚Äôll be doing much more than simply meeting sales targets. And thanks to your outstanding communications skills - primarily in your local language but also with a good level of English - you‚Äôll be able to present a truly compelling narrative to large and small audiences alike.

Most importantly though, you‚Äôll have the right, can-do mindset: passion, curiosity, pride, drive and ownership. We‚Äôll look after the rest.

What You‚Äôll Be Doing

Join our team of over 200 Partnerships Sales Leaders and you‚Äôll get to harness your entrepreneurial mindset, strong business and financial acumen, and commitment to achieving outstanding business development results as we add to the over 1,000 deals in 50+ countries closed in the past year alone.

From one day to the next, you‚Äôll get the chance to:

Agree high-value deals to deliver inspiring new partner locations, leveraging your expertise to expand the IWG network in every town and city
Hunt out exciting opportunities in commercial buildings of all types across your region, pitch for new partnership opportunities, convince partners to invest anywhere from ¬£250k to ¬£1m+ to develop a new IWG branded centre and close out deals quickly & effectively
Showcase the value of the IWG partnership proposition to your network of B2B connections
Source ambitious partners who match our growth goals and can help drive our rapid growth through building conversions, new development locations or competitor conversions
Employ a dynamic and versatile approach to business development, tailoring it to our partners‚Äô varying commercial needs and requirements
Actively manage your pipeline of opportunities to drive each opportunity from initial contact, through detailed commercial negotiations, all the way to a signed commercial agreement.


Carbon Neutral Workplaces

IWG‚Äôs purpose is to help everyone have a great day at work, while protecting people and the planet. We are proud to supply all our customers with carbon-neutral workplaces, and have a strong climate action plan in place to help us achieve our objective of Net Zero emissions by 2040.

Leading Employer Award

IWG is proud to be the recipient of a Leading Employer Award in 2022, 2023 and 2024. Awarded exclusively to the top 1% of employers, the accolade is testament to our diverse global workforce and the role everyone plays in bringing our purpose, culture and values to life, every single day.

Join us at https://careers.iwgplc.com/home

About the job
Terralogiq is a leading Indonesian technology company and the country's first and only Google Maps Premier Partner. We specialize in location intelligence, geospatial solutions, and mobility services, empowering businesses from startups to large enterprises and government agencies to make data-driven decisions. As we continue to expand our innovative projects, we are seeking a highly experienced and strategic Senior Project Manager to join our dynamic team.

About the Role:

The Senior Project Manager will be responsible for the successful planning, execution, and delivery of complex, high-value projects for our diverse clientele. This senior role demands a seasoned professional with a minimum of 8 years of experience in project management, preferably within the technology, geospatial, or cloud solutions industry. The ideal candidate will be a strategic thinker with a proven track record of managing multifaceted projects from inception to completion, ensuring they are delivered on time, within scope, and on budget.

Key Responsibilities:

Lead the planning and implementation of enterprise-level projects, including defining scope, goals, and deliverables.
Develop and manage detailed project plans, timelines, budgets, and resource allocation.
Serve as the primary point of contact for key client stakeholders, fostering strong, collaborative relationships.
Coordinate internal resources and third parties/vendors for the flawless execution of projects.
Proactively identify and manage project risks, issues, and dependencies, implementing effective mitigation strategies.
Track project performance using appropriate systems, tools, and techniques, and report progress to all stakeholders.
Ensure all projects are delivered to the highest quality standards and meet client expectations.
Provide leadership, guidance, and mentorship to junior project management staff and project team members.
Contribute to the continuous improvement of our project management methodologies and best practices.

Qualifications and Skills:

A minimum of 8 years of proven experience in project management, with a significant portion in the technology sector.
A Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, Business Administration, or a related field. A Master's degree is a plus.
Strong understanding of and experience with geospatial technologies, location intelligence, and/or cloud platforms (Google Cloud Platform, Google Maps Platform is highly desirable).
Demonstrable experience in managing the full project lifecycle for complex software development or data analytics projects.
Excellent client-facing and internal communication skills, with fluency in both English and Bahasa Indonesia.
Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.
Solid organizational skills, including meticulous attention to detail and multitasking abilities.
Proficiency in project management software (e.g., Jira, Asana, Microsoft Project).
Project Management Professional (PMP) or equivalent certification is highly preferred.
A strategic mindset with the ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions and project plans.
Proven ability to lead and motivate cross-functional teams in a fast-paced environment.

job_title: BI Analyst (Supply Analytics, Bangkok-based, Relocation provided)
job_description:
About the job
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,‚ÄØenhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Our Purpose - Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (WITH RELOCATION PROVIDED)

Location: Bangkok, Thailand (*Not open for remote work)

Get to Know our Team:

As part of the Supply Analytics, you will be responsible for identifying new partners and opportunities, cultivating a relationship with them, and working together with them to deliver the best outcome for our end customers. You would also be responsible with managing the day-to-day interaction with the partner and working closely with other teams within Agoda to ensure the partners needs are met.

We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda‚Äôs unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.

The Opportunity: 

As a BI Analyst, you will report directly to either the Senior Manager or Associate Director within the Supply Department and this will be an individual contributor role. You will be responsible and fully empowered to work with the partners on the ground. You will be supported by a team within the Supply department and work closely with other Team members within Agoda.

In this Role, you‚Äôll get to:

Translate internal briefs into analytical projects (to include refining the initial brief and asking the ‚Äòright questions‚Äô, working through potential hypotheses and storyboarding the output)
Use and analyze data from multiple large-scale data warehouses and present statistically strong analysis to a wide range of business stakeholders.
Proactively identify opportunities for growth within supply and the wider business.
Drive new analytical initiatives and projects aimed at improving organizational efficiency and shaping Agoda supply.
Identify, support, and lead projects aimed at scaling up the way the Supply organization leverages on data, insights, and intelligence.
Automate manual operational processes and present back on time savings gained through modernization of business operations

What you‚Äôll Need to Succeed:

At least 2-5+ years of experience working as an Analyst with experience in analytics/data science/insights/strategy/BI
Advanced working knowledge and hands-on experience in SQL
Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in data visualization tools such as Tableau (preferably) 
Expert domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, Python (or R)
Bachelor‚Äôs degree ideally in a business or quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
A good understanding of statistical modelling knowledge or any machine learning technique knowledge (such as hypothesis testing, regression, logistic regression, random forest, etc.)
Good stakeholder management experience. Comfortable presenting to senior leadership and C-suite.
Experience in conducting A/B testing experimentation
Strong experience in finding data insights and provide business recommendation to the business
A hacker‚Äôs mindset ‚Äì the ability to build simple but clever and elegant solutions to new problems within significant resource, operational and time constraints through deep understanding of the business, creative problem solving, and a wide range of expertise in data, analytics, automation, programming, and prototyping.
Excellent communicator with superior written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal communication skills.
Data driven in both decision making and performance measurement.
Extreme comfort in ambiguous, fast-paced environment.
Ability to multi-task, prioritize and coordinate resources.

It‚Äôs Great if you Have: 

MBA or Masters in a quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
Program management certifications (e.g. PMI, PRINCE2) to compliment your program management experience.
Asian market experience.
Travel industry / e-commerce / tech / consulting experience.

About the job
Partnership Sales Manager

Are you ready to lead the charge and be at the forefront of our ambitious global expansion? Is hunting, pitching and prospecting second nature to you? Can you confidently agree high-value commercial deals with building owners? Is business development in your blood? And are you relentless in your pursuit of delivering results, with the determination and resilience to change the world of work?

If yes, we need to talk.

What We Can Do For You

You‚Äôre reading the right ad if you‚Äôre looking for:

The most exciting growth opportunity in the world, where you‚Äôll be challenged every day
Excellent training, development and promotion opportunities
A fantastic incentive scheme which can see you earn great commission and prizes.


We know we can only succeed if we give all our people every opportunity to shine. It‚Äôs why so many of our most senior leaders started their careers in our centres. And it‚Äôs what made IWG the dominant global leader in the flexible-workspace industry.

About IWG

IWG is the world‚Äôs leading flexible workspace provider - with the world‚Äôs most ambitious growth programme to open 30,000+ new centres over the next decade to complement our international network of 4,000+ tech-enabled, sustainable and inspiring flexible work centres. Across our multiple brands, including Regus, Spaces, HQ and Signature, we‚Äôre provide world-beating workplace solutions to over 80% of Fortune 500 companies, including Netflix, EY, Amazon and Uber, as well as to local small start-ups, entrepreneurs and emerging businesses.

About You

You‚Äôll need to be passionate about working in a high-growth sector and ready to play a leading role in disrupting the commercial real-estate industry. You‚Äôll excel at growing your network rapidly and taking our proposition to them. And you‚Äôll thrive on initiating and closing multiple high-value deals at pace driven by your tenacity and expertise.

Whether pursuing your own leads or following up on centrally-driven enquiries, you‚Äôll highlight what makes an IWG partnership so special. By ensuring prospective partners fully understand the value of our proposition, you‚Äôll be doing much more than simply meeting sales targets. And thanks to your outstanding communications skills - primarily in your local language but also with a good level of English - you‚Äôll be able to present a truly compelling narrative to large and small audiences alike.

Most importantly though, you‚Äôll have the right, can-do mindset: passion, curiosity, pride, drive and ownership. We‚Äôll look after the rest.

What You‚Äôll Be Doing

Join our team of over 200 Partnerships Sales Leaders and you‚Äôll get to harness your entrepreneurial mindset, strong business and financial acumen, and commitment to achieving outstanding business development results as we add to the over 1,000 deals in 50+ countries closed in the past year alone.

From one day to the next, you‚Äôll get the chance to:

Agree high-value deals to deliver inspiring new partner locations, leveraging your expertise to expand the IWG network in every town and city
Hunt out exciting opportunities in commercial buildings of all types across your region, pitch for new partnership opportunities, convince partners to invest anywhere from ¬£250k to ¬£1m+ to develop a new IWG branded centre and close out deals quickly & effectively
Showcase the value of the IWG partnership proposition to your network of B2B connections
Source ambitious partners who match our growth goals and can help drive our rapid growth through building conversions, new development locations or competitor conversions
Employ a dynamic and versatile approach to business development, tailoring it to our partners‚Äô varying commercial needs and requirements
Actively manage your pipeline of opportunities to drive each opportunity from initial contact, through detailed commercial negotiations, all the way to a signed commercial agreement.


Carbon Neutral Workplaces

IWG‚Äôs purpose is to help everyone have a great day at work, while protecting people and the planet. We are proud to supply all our customers with carbon-neutral workplaces, and have a strong climate action plan in place to help us achieve our objective of Net Zero emissions by 2040.

Leading Employer Award

IWG is proud to be the recipient of a Leading Employer Award in 2022, 2023 and 2024. Awarded exclusively to the top 1% of employers, the accolade is testament to our diverse global workforce and the role everyone plays in bringing our purpose, culture and values to life, every single day.

Join us at https://careers.iwgplc.com/home

About the job
Terralogiq is a leading Indonesian technology company and the country's first and only Google Maps Premier Partner. We specialize in location intelligence, geospatial solutions, and mobility services, empowering businesses from startups to large enterprises and government agencies to make data-driven decisions. As we continue to expand our innovative projects, we are seeking a highly experienced and strategic Senior Project Manager to join our dynamic team.

About the Role:

The Senior Project Manager will be responsible for the successful planning, execution, and delivery of complex, high-value projects for our diverse clientele. This senior role demands a seasoned professional with a minimum of 8 years of experience in project management, preferably within the technology, geospatial, or cloud solutions industry. The ideal candidate will be a strategic thinker with a proven track record of managing multifaceted projects from inception to completion, ensuring they are delivered on time, within scope, and on budget.

Key Responsibilities:

Lead the planning and implementation of enterprise-level projects, including defining scope, goals, and deliverables.
Develop and manage detailed project plans, timelines, budgets, and resource allocation.
Serve as the primary point of contact for key client stakeholders, fostering strong, collaborative relationships.
Coordinate internal resources and third parties/vendors for the flawless execution of projects.
Proactively identify and manage project risks, issues, and dependencies, implementing effective mitigation strategies.
Track project performance using appropriate systems, tools, and techniques, and report progress to all stakeholders.
Ensure all projects are delivered to the highest quality standards and meet client expectations.
Provide leadership, guidance, and mentorship to junior project management staff and project team members.
Contribute to the continuous improvement of our project management methodologies and best practices.

Qualifications and Skills:

A minimum of 8 years of proven experience in project management, with a significant portion in the technology sector.
A Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, Business Administration, or a related field. A Master's degree is a plus.
Strong understanding of and experience with geospatial technologies, location intelligence, and/or cloud platforms (Google Cloud Platform, Google Maps Platform is highly desirable).
Demonstrable experience in managing the full project lifecycle for complex software development or data analytics projects.
Excellent client-facing and internal communication skills, with fluency in both English and Bahasa Indonesia.
Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.
Solid organizational skills, including meticulous attention to detail and multitasking abilities.
Proficiency in project management software (e.g., Jira, Asana, Microsoft Project).
Project Management Professional (PMP) or equivalent certification is highly preferred.
A strategic mindset with the ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions and project plans.
Proven ability to lead and motivate cross-functional teams in a fast-paced environment.
